character.description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets are five tiny young mermaids who are friends with Keimi. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

character.name: Smoothie
character.description: Tekkin no Smoothie is an ex-prisoner, who is now a centaur henchman for Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Fen Bock
character.description: Hyoutan Fen Bock is an ex-prisoner. During the Punk Hazard Arc, he worked as a satyr henchman for Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Smiley
character.description: Smiley, more commonly known as Slime and also as Shinokuni, was a pet of Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Chappe
character.description: Nawahiki no Chappe is an ex-prisoner, who was a henchman for Caesar Clown. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Yarisugi
character.description: Yarisugi is a Marine Commodore of G-5 Unit 06. Source: One Piece Wikia

character.name: Chessmarimo
character.description: Chessmarimo is a fusion of Chess and Kuromarimo, created by Wapol`s Baku Baku Factory.

episode.title: ルフィの過去! 赤髪のシャンクス登場
Luffy`s Past! Enter Red-Haired Shanks!
Le passé de Luffy ! L`apparition de Shanks Le Roux
Uno sguardo al passato
Прошлое Луффи! Появление Рыжего Шанкса!
루피의 과거! 북은 머리 샹크스 등장
อดีตของลูฟี่! แชงคูสปรากฏตัว!
Luffy no Kako! Akagami no Shanks Toujou
路飞的过去！红发的香克斯登场
episode.summary: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖 謎の力! 海賊道化バギー船長!
A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!
Pouvoirs mystérieux épouvantables ! Capitaine Baggy le Clown !
Un pagliaccio di capitano
Какой ужас, таинственная сила! Пират-клоун, капитан Багги!
공포 수수께끼의 힘! 해적 광대 버기 선장!
ความกลัว! พลังแห่งผลปิศาจ! กัปตันโจรสลัดตัวตลกบากี้ปรากฏตัว!
Kyoufu Nazo no Chikara! Kaizoku Douke Buggy-Senchou!
恐怖 神秘的力量！海贼小丑巴基船长！
episode.summary: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, she’s perfect for Luffy’s new crew – except for the fact that Nami hates pirates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼフとサンジの夢 幻のオールブルー
Zeff and Sanji`s Dream! The Illusory All Blue!
Le rêve de Zeff et Sanji ! Le miracle de All Blue
Un debito di gratitudine
Мечта Санджи и Зеффа. Сказочный Олл-Блу
ความฝันของเซฟและซันจิ!
Zeff to Sanji no Yume: Maboroshi no All Blue
episode.summary: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 壮絶決闘! 剣豪ゾロ VS 曲芸のカバジ!
Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!
Combat acharné : Zoro, le manieur de sabres VS Cabaji, l`acrobate
La sfida
Великий поединок! Фехтовальщик Зоро против акробата Кабадзи!
ศึกตัดสินชะตา! นักดาบโซโลปะทะนักกายกรรมคาบาจิ
Souzetsu Kettou! Kengou Zoro VS Kyokugei no Cabaji!
壮烈决斗！剑豪索隆VS杂耍卡巴吉
episode.summary: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggy`s pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命! 猛獣使いモージ VS ルフィ!
Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!
Situation désespérée ! Morge, le dresseur de fauves contre Luffy !
Il domatore domato
Отчаянное положение! Укротитель Модзи против Луффи!
절대절명! 맹수 조련사 모디 VS 루피!
สถานการณ์ที่สิ้นหวัง! นักฝึกสัตว์โมจิปะทะลูฟี่
Zettai Zetsumei! Moujuu Tsukai Mohji VS Luffy!
一筹莫展！驯兽师摩奇VS路飞
episode.summary: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggy’s pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俺はルフィ! 海賊王になる男だ!
I`m Luffy! The Man Who`s Gonna Be King of the Pirates!
Hier kommt Ruffy, der künftige König der Piraten!
Je suis Luffy ! Celui qui deviendra Roi des pirates !
Il ragazzo di gomma
Я — Луффи! Я стану королём пиратов!
나는 루피! 해적왕이 될 남자다!
Eu Sou Luffy! O Homem Que Vai Ser o Rei dos Piratas!
ฉันคือลูฟี่! ชายผู้ที่จะเป็นจ้าวแห่งโจรสลัด!
Ore wa Luffy! Kaizoku Ou ni Naru Otoko Da!
我是路飞！要成为海贼王的男人！
episode.summary: Countless souls have been lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of the legendary One Piece! Luffy D. Monkey is a young pirate with a dream: to prove the legend true and be king of them all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 正義のうそつき? キャプテンウソップ
The Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp!
Le Justicier menteur : Capitaine Usopp
Un simpatico bugiardo
Честный врун? Капитан Усопп!
จอมโกหกของหมู่บ้าน! กัปตันอุซป!
Seigi no Usotsuki? Captain Usopp
正义的骗子？乌索普船长
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp - who has a connection to Luffy`s past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝者はどっち? 悪魔の実の能力対決!
Who Is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!
Qui sortira vainqueur ? Le bras de fer des pouvoirs des fruits du Démon !
Una vecchia conoscenza
Кто победит? Столкновение двух дьявольских способностей!
ใครคือผู้ชนะ! การจบศึกแห่งผลปิศาจ!
Shousha wa Docchi! Akuma no Mi no Nouryoku Taiketsu!
谁是赢家？恶魔果实能力大对决！
episode.summary: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モーガンVSルフィ! 謎の美少女は誰?
Morgan vs. Luffy! Who`s the Mysterious Pretty Girl?
Morgan VS Luffy ! Qui est cette belle inconnue ?
La liberazione di Zoro
Морган против Луффи! Кто эта загадочная красотка?
모건 VS 루피! 수수께끼의 미소녀는 누구?
Morgan vs. Luffy! Quem é Aquela Linda Misteriosa?
มอร์แกนปะทะลูฟี่ เด็กคนนี้คือใครน่ะ!
Morgan VS Luffy! Nazo no Bishoujo wa Dare?
蒙卡VS路飞！神秘的美少女是谁？
episode.summary: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 陰謀を暴け! 海賊執事キャプテンクロ
Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!
Un plan machiavélique ! Le Capitaine Kuro
Mai gridare "Al lupo"
Раскрыть заговор! Пират-дворецкий капитан Куро
การวางแผนถูกเปิดโปง! พี่เลี้ยงโจรสลัด! กัปตันคุโระ!
Inbou o Abake! Kaizoku Shitsushi Captain Kuro
揭发阴谋！海贼管家克洛船长
episode.summary: Usopp spreads word of Kuro`s evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大剣豪現る! 海賊狩りロロノア・ゾロ
Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!
Le grand manieur de sabre ! Roronoa Zoro, chasseur de pirates !
Il cacciatore di pirati
Появление великого фехтовальщика! Охотник на пиратов Ророноа Зоро
대검호 나타나다! 해적 사냥꾼 롤로노아 조로
O Grande Espadachim aparece! Caçador de Piratas, Roronoa Zoro
ชายผู้เป็นสุดยอดนักดาบ! นักล่าโจรสลัด! โรโรโนอา โซโล!
Daikengou Arawaru! Kaizokugari Roronoa Zoro
大剑豪现身！海贼猎人 罗罗诺亚・索隆
episode.summary: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 史上最強の変な奴! 催眠術師ジャンゴ
The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!
Un étranger des plus étranges : Jango, l`hypnotiseur !
La forza dell`ipnosi
Самый сильный чудак в истории! Гипнотизёр Джанго
บุคคลที่บ้าที่สุดในโลก! จังโก้นักสะกดจิต!
Shijou Saikyou no Hen na Yatsu! Saiminjutsushi Jango
史上最怪的家伙！催眠师赞高
episode.summary: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kaya`s fortune and live the stolen life of luxury. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! クロネコ海賊団坂道の大攻防!
Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!
Un affrontement violent ! La grande bataille contre l`équipage du Chat Noir !
L`approdo sbagliato
Столкновение! Пиратская шайка Чёрной кошки, схватка на склоне!
การต่อสู้บนที่ลาดชัน! กลุ่มโจรสลัดแมวดำ ปรากฏตัว!
Gekitotsu! Kuroneko Kaizoku Dan Sakamichi no Daikoubou!
激战！黑猫海贼团 坡道上的攻防战！
episode.summary: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but they`ve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖の二人組! ニャーバン兄弟[ブラザーズ]VSゾロ
The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!
Le duo de choc ! Les frères Siamois contre Zoro !
Una terribile coppia
Устрашающий дуэт! Братья Мяубан против Зоро!
การต่อสู้ที่น่ากลัว!พี่น้องเนียบัน ปะทะ นักดาบโซโล!
Kyoufu no Futarigumi! Nyaban Brothers vs Zoro
恐怖的二人组！猫人兄弟VS索隆
episode.summary: In an effort to save Usopp`s village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders` path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ復活! カヤお嬢様の決死の抵抗
Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya`s Desperate Resistance!
Luffy se réveille ! La rébellion de Mademoiselle Kaya
Il risveglio del ragazzo di gomma
Воскрешение Луффи! Отчаянная борьба госпожи Каи!
การเผชิญหน้าระหว่างความเป็นความตาย!
Luffy Fukkatsu! Kaya-ojousama no Kesshi no Teikou
路飞复活！可雅小姐拼死的抵抗
episode.summary: Nami manages to rescue Zoro`s missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロを倒せ! 男ウソップ涙の決意!
Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man`s Tearful Resolve!
La bataille contre Kuro ! La détermination d`Usopp
Una mente diabolica
Сразить Куро! Выстраданная решимость Усоппа!
เอาชนะคุโระ! ความมุ่งมันของอุซป!
Kuro o Taose! Otoko Usopp Namida no Ketsui!
打倒克洛！男子汉乌索普悲痛的决定！
episode.summary: Usopp`s friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カヤを守れ! ウソップ海賊団大活躍!
Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates` Great Efforts!
Protégez Kaya ! La Bande à Usopp entre en jeu !
La ciurma dei coraggiosi
Защитить Каю! Пиратская шайка Усоппа в действии!
ปกป้องคายะ! กลุ่มโจรสลัดอุซป ปฏิบัติการ!
Kaya o Mamore! Usopp Kaizokudan Daikatsuyaku!
保护可雅！乌索普海贼团大显身手！
episode.summary: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒り爆発! クロVSルフィ決着の行方!
Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How It Ends!
L`explosion de colère ! Kuro contre Luffy : le combat final
Atto finale
Взрыв ярости! Куро против Луффи, решающая схватка!
Explosão de Raiva! O Final da Batalha Entre Kuro e Luffy!
ปิดฉากการต่อส!ู้ คุโระปะทะลูฟี่!
Ikari Bakuhatsu! Kuro VS Luffy Kecchaku no Yukue!
愤怒爆发！克洛VS路飞 最终结局！
episode.summary: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates` efforts to save her with a ship to call their own - the Going Merry! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あんたが珍獣! ガイモンと奇妙な仲間
You`re the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!
Un animal étrange : Gaimon et ses drôles d`amis
L`uomo nel forziere
Ты такая странная зверушка! Гаймон и его необыкновенные соратники
สัตว์ประหลาดไกม่อน! และสัตว์ของเขา!
Anata ga Chinjuu! Gaimon to Kimyou na Nakama
你就是稀有野兽！卡蒙和奇妙的伙伴
episode.summary: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三刀流の過去! ゾロとくいなの誓い!
The Three-Sword Style`s Past! Zoro and Kuina`s Vow!
Le passé des trois sabres ! La promesse de Zoro et Kuina
Un salto nel passato
История стиля трёх мечей! Клятва Зоро и Куины!
เบื้องหลังวิชาสามดาบ! คำสัญญาระหว่างเพื่อนโซโลและคุอินะ!
Santouryuu no Kako! Zoro to Kuina no Chikai!
三刀流的过去！索隆与克伊娜的誓言！
episode.summary: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the world`s greatest swordsman - but tragedy intervened. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名物コック! 海上レストランのサンジ
Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!
Un fameux cuistot ! Sanji sur le navire-restaurant
Il ristorante sul mare
Прославленный кок! Санджи из плавучего ресторана
กุ๊กมือหนึ่ง! ซันจิแห่งภัตรคารลอยทะเล!
Meibutsu Cook! Kaijou Restaurant no Sanji
著名厨师！海上餐厅的山治
episode.summary: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 招かれざる客! サンジの飯とギンの恩
Unwelcome Customer! Sanji`s Food and Ghin`s Debt!
Un invité indésirable ! Le repas de Sanji et les obligations de Gyn
Ospiti sgraditi
Непрошеный гость! Угощение Санджи и благодарность Гина
แขกไม่ได้รับเชิญ! ความหิวโหยของกิงและอาหารของซันจิ!
Manekarezaru Kyaku! Sanji no Meshi to Gin no On
episode.summary: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merry`s found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の海賊艦隊! 提督ドン・クリーク
The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!
Une armada impressionnante ! Le terrible Amiral Don Krieg
Fame di conquista
Сильнейшая пиратская флотилия! Адмирал дон Криг
ผู้บัญชาการกองเรือรบ! ดอน ครีก!
Saikyou no Kaizoku Kantai! Teitoku Don Krieg
episode.summary: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守れバラティエ! 大海賊・赫足のゼフ

episode.summary: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel - or die trying. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 残る騎士道! ナミを守る裏切りゾンビ
Chivalry Remains! The Traitorous Zombie Protects Nami!
Gentleman, quoi qu`il arrive ! Le zombie traître prêt à protéger Nami
Nokoru Kishidou! Nami o Mamoru Uragiri Zombie
episode.summary: A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空から参上! 剣狭ハナウタはあの男!
Appearing from the Sky! That Man Is the Humming Swordsman!
Il surgit du ciel ! Escrimeur, gentleman et fredonneur à ses heures
Sora kara Sanjou! Kenkyou Hanauta wa Ano Otoko!
episode.summary: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ緊急事態! 最強の影の行き先!
Luffy`s Emergency Situation! The Ultimate Shadow`s Destination!
Situation de crise pour Luffy ! Le devenir de la plus puissante des ombres !
Luffy Kinkyuujitai! Saikyou no Kage no Ikisaki
episode.summary: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria`s devious plan is revealed, and Luffy`s escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can`t live without! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔人と呼ばれた戦士!! オーズ復活の時
The Warrior Known As the `Devil`!! The Moment of Oars` Revival!
Le guerrier à la réputation de démon ! Oz revient à la vie !
Majin to Yobareta Senshi!! Oz Fukkatsu no Toki
episode.summary: Brook tells Franky and Robin the secret to slaying zombies, and Gecko Moria reveals the terrifying monster that will be the recipient of Luffy`s shadow! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 500年ぶりの目覚め!! オーズ開眼!!
Awakening After 500 Years!! Oars Opens His Eyes!!
Un sommeil long de 500 ans ! Oz ouvre les yeux !
500-nenburi no Mezame!! Oars Kaigan!!
episode.summary: Luffy`s shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 信念の命乞い!! アフロを守るブルック
A Belief Worth Begging to Live For!! Brook Defends His Afro!
Assez de conviction pour supplier pour sa vie ! Brook protège sa coupe afro !
Shinnen no Inochigoi!! Afro o Mamoru Brook
episode.summary: Gecko Moria`s minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy`s shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の誓いは死なず!! 遠い空で待つ友へ
A Man`s Promise Never Dies!! To the Friend Waiting Under the Distant Sky!
La promesse d’un homme ne meurt jamais ! Pour toi, mon ami qui m’attends au loin
Otoko no Chikai wa Shinazu!! Tooi Sora de Matsu Tomo e
episode.summary: The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook`s story about a promise he made to a very special whale! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 必ず会いに行く!! ブルックと約束の岬
I Swear to Go See Him!! Brook and the Cape of Promise!
Je reviendrai te voir, sois en sûr ! Brook et le cap de la promesse
Kanarazu Ai ni Iku!! Brook to Yakusoku no Misaki
episode.summary: Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook`s battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メシとナミと影!! ルフィ怒りの大反撃
Food, Nami, and Shadows!! Luffy`s Enraged Counterattack!
L`essentiel à sauver : La bouffe, Nami, nos ombres. La contre-attaque rageuse de Luffy
Meshi to Nami to Kage!! Luffy Ikari no Daihangeki
episode.summary: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami`s zombie wedding before it`s too late! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソップ最強? ネガティブは任せとけ
Usopp`s the Strongest? Leave Anything Negative to Him!
Usopp serait-il le plus fort ? Être négatif, c`est son affaire
Usopp Saikyou? Negative wa Makasetoke
episode.summary: Usopp`s naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona`s depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 将軍[ジェネラル]ゾンビ瞬殺!! オーズは冒険気分!!
The General Zombies Are Down in a Flash!! Oars Feels Like an Adventure!!
Mort subite des généraux zombies ! Oz est d`humeur pour l`aventure
General Zombie Shunsatsu!! Oars wa Bouken Kibun!!
episode.summary: When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ペローナ恐怖!? 嘘のウはウソップのウ
Perona Is Terrified!! Usopp and Untruthful Share the Same `U`!
La bête noire de Perona ! L’usurpateur signe d’un U, qui veut dire Usopp
Perona Kyoufu!? Uso no U wa Usopp no U
episode.summary: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can`t lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 助けて英雄[ヒーロー]!? 敵は不死身のプリンセス
Save Me, Hero!! My Enemy Is the Immortal Princess!
Un héros à la rescousse ! L`ennemi est une princesse immortelle
Tasukete Hero!? Teki wa Fujimi no Princess
episode.summary: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スケスケの因縁? 奪われたサンジの夢
A Clear-Clear History? Sanji`s Stolen Dream
Le lien de l`invisibilité ? Le rêve volé de Sanji !
Suke Suke no Innen? Ubawareta Sanji no Yume
episode.summary: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎の騎士[ナイト]サンジ!! 蹴り潰せ偽りの挙式
Blazing Knight Sanji!! Kick Down the Fake Wedding!
Sanji, le chevalier enflammé ! Un bon coup de pied dans cette fausse cérémonie !
Honoo no Knight Sanji!! Keritsubuse Itsuwari no Kyoshiki
episode.summary: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami`s beastly abductor! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 屋根に舞う斬撃!! 決着ゾロVSリューマ
Slashes Dancing on the Rooftop!! Showdown: Zoro vs. Ryuma!
Les sabres virevoltent sur le toit ! Zoro contre Ryuma : épilogue
Yane ni Mau Zangeki!! Kecchaku Zoro Tai Ryuuma
episode.summary: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チョッパー激怒!! ホグバック魔の医術
Chopper Is Furious!! Hogback`s Evil Medical Practices!
Chopper en colère ! La médecine diabolique du docteur Hogback !
Chopper Gekido!! Hogback Ma no Ijutsu
episode.summary: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback`s evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who`s wearing his shadow! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オーズ吼える!! 出て来い麦わらの一味
Oars Roars! Come Out, Straw Hat Crew!
Le rugissement d’Oz ! Montrez-vous, pirates au chapeau de paille !
Oz Hoeru!! Detekoi Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: Moria`s mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy`s shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji`s eyes! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵はルフィ!! 最強ゾンビ対麦わらの一味
Luffy Is the Enemy! The Ultimate Zombie vs. the Straw Hat Crew!
Luffy est notre ennemi ! Le plus puissant des zombies contre les pirates !
Teki wa Luffy!! Saikyou Zombie Tai Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy`s got his sights set on Moria, but he`d better hurry if he wants to save his crew! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 倒れろアブサロム!! ナミ友情の雷撃!!
You`re Going Down, Absalom!! Nami`s Lightning Attack of Friendship!!
Vaincre Absalom par amitié ! Le coup de foudre de Nami !
Taorero Absalom!! Nami Yuujou no Raigeki!!
episode.summary: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she’s about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by a very jealous warthog! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奪えダウン!! 必殺麦わらドッキング?
Knock Him Down!! Special Attack: Straw Hat Docking?
Et de un à terre ! Une technique secrète : l’arrimage des chapeaux de paille
Ubae Down!! Hissatsu Mugiwara Docking?
episode.summary: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 足音なき襲来!! 謎の訪問者 暴君くま
The Silent Assault!! The Mysterious Visitor, `Tyrant` Kuma!
Une invasion silencieuse. Le mystérieux visiteur : Kuma le tyran
Ashioto Naki Shuurai!! Nazo no Boumonsha: Boukun Kuma
episode.summary: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オーズ+モリア 力と頭脳の最凶合体
Oars + Moria! The Most Heinous Combination of Brains and Brawn!
Oz plus Moria : Force et intelligence, le pire des mélanges !
Oars Plus Moriah: Chikara to Zunou no Saikyou Gattai
episode.summary: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転への秘策 ナイトメア・ルフィ見参
The Secret Plan to Turn the Tables! Nightmare Luffy Makes His Appearance!
Un plan secret pour tout renverser ! L’apparition de Nightmare Luffy !
Gyakuten e no Hisaku: Nightmare Luffy Kenzan
episode.summary: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 壊滅, 麦わら一味 カゲカゲの能力[ちから]全開
The Straw Hat Crew Gets Wiped Out! The Shadow-Shadow`s Powers in Full Swing!
L’équipage au chapeau de paille est anéanti. Le plein potentiel du fruit de l’ombre
Kaimetsu, Mugiwara Ichimi: Kagekage no Chikara Zenkai
episode.summary: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超絶バトルスタート! ルフィVSルフィ
The Incredible Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Luffy!
La bataille ultime commence ! Luffy contre Luffy
Chouzetsu Battle Start! Luffy vs Luffy
episode.summary: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決着迫る! たたき込め, とどめの一撃
The End of the Battle Is Nigh! Pound in the Finishing Move!
Le dénouement est proche ! Un coup de grâce à donner
Kecchaku Semaru! Tatakikome, Todome no Ichigeki
episode.summary: After Luffy’s shadow power disappears, he’ll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: One Piece - Special Zoro
One Piece - Special Sanji
肉体が消える! 悪夢の島に射す朝日!
Our Bodies Vanish! The Morning Sun Shines on the Nightmarish Island!
Les corps se désintègrent ! Le soleil darde ses premiers rayons sur l’île des cauchemars !
Karada ga Kieru! Akumu no Shima ni Sasu Asahi!
episode.summary: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終わらない危機! 麦わら一味抹殺指令
Not Out of Danger Yet! Orders to Annihilate the Straw Hat Crew!
Les crises s’enchaînent ! Ordre d’extermination des pirates au chapeau de paille !
Owaranai Kiki! Mugiwara Ichimi Massatsu Shirei
episode.summary: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: One Piece - Special Nami
すべてを弾く くまのニキュニキュの能力[ちから]
It Repels Everything! Kuma`s Paw-Paw Power!
Le pouvoir des coussinets : Kuma peut tout repousser
Subete o Hajiku: Kuma no Nikyunikyu no Chikara
episode.summary: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats – battered as they may be – refuse to go down without a fight! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: One Piece - Special Usopp
仲間の痛みは我が痛み ゾロ決死の戦い
The Pain of My Crewmates Is My Pain! Zoro`s Desperate Fight!
La douleur de mon ami sera mienne. Zoro se prépare au pire
Nakama no Itami wa Waga Itami: Zoro Kesshi no Tatakai
episode.summary: Zoro slashes against the Pacifista Kuma is meet with resistance harder than steel. Unable to win with his swords he bets everything on a trade. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遠い日の約束 海賊の唄と小さなクジラ
A Promise from a Distant Day! The Pirates` Song and a Small Whale!
Une promesse très lointaine. La chanson des pirates et la petite baleine
Tooi Hi no Yakusoku: Kaizoku no Uta to Chiisana Kujira
episode.summary: As the story of Kuma and Zoro is discussed, Brooks remembers back to when he was alive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブルックの過去 陽気な仲間悲しき別れ
Brook`s Past! A Sad Farewell with His Cheerful Comrade!
Le passé de Brook. Tristes adieux à de joyeux compagnons
Brook no Kako: Youki na Nakama Kanashiki Wakare
episode.summary: The continued story of Brooks the pirate and his friend Laboon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ビンクスの酒 過去と現在をつなぐ唄
Bink`s Booze! The Song That Connects the Past with the Present!
Le bon rhum de Binks. Une chanson qui relie le passé au présent
Binks no Sake: Kako to Genzai o Tsunagu Uta
episode.summary: Brooks shares the story of the final days of the Rumbar pirates and their final song. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな仲間! 音楽家・鼻唄のブルック
A New Crewmate! The Musician, Humming Brook!
Un nouveau compagnon ! Brook, musicien et fredonneur
Arata na Nakama! Ongakuka Hanauta no Brook
episode.summary: With a new official crewmate, the Straw Hat Pirates are ready to set sail. Lola shares with Nami a unique item only available in the New World! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノロノロの脅威 銀狐のフォクシー再び
The Slow-Slow Menace! `Silver Fox` Foxy Returns!
La menace ramollo ! Le retour de Foxy le Renard Argenté !
Noronoro no Kyoui: Gingitsune no Foxy Futatabi
episode.summary: While resting at a floating resort, Spa Island. The Straw Hat crew runs into a familiar old face and big trouble. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お宝大争奪戦! 崩壊! スパアイランド号
The Great Scramble for Treasure! Collapse! Spa Island!
La grande chasse au trésor ! Spa Island est anéantie !
Otakara Daisoudatsusen! Houkai! Spa Island Gou
episode.summary: After Sayo is kidnapped, Luffy agrees to help Rina get her back. His foolproof idea sends shockwaves through Spa Island. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブルック大奮闘 真の仲間への道険し?
Brook`s Great Struggle! Is the Path to Becoming a True Comrade Rigorous?
Brook tombe sur un os. Le difficile chemin pour devenir un véritable ami !
Brook Daifuntou: Shin no Nakama e no Michi Kewashi?
episode.summary: Brook’s eagerness to become a trust comrade is backfiring immensely. What is causing his new anxiety and the crew survive much longer? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 偉大なる航路半周到達! 赤い土の大陸
Halfway Across the Grand Line! Arrival at the Red Line!
À la moitié de Grand Line ! Red Line nous tend les bras !
Grand Line Hanshuu Toutatsu! Red Line
episode.summary: The Straw Hats have finally reached the red line with each member thinking back on the adventure. Straws are picked to decided who will take the submarine to investigate the way to Fish-man Isle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 麦わら一味憎し 鉄仮面のデュバル登場
Hatred for the Straw Hats! Iron Mask Duval Appears!
Une dent contre les chapeaux de paille ! Duval, l’homme au masque de fer, fait son entrée !
Mugiwara Ichimi Nikushi: Tekkamen no Duval Toujou
episode.summary: After indirectly rescuing a unique pair, they beg the straw heats to help rescue a friend that has been kidnapped by Iron Mask Duval. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 因縁の再会! 囚われの魚人を救い出せ
The Fated Reunion! Save the Imprisoned Fishman!
Des retrouvailles sous le signe du destin ! Il faut sauver l’Homme-poisson prisonnier
Innen no Saikai! Toraware no Gyojin o Sukuidase
episode.summary: Arriving at Duval’s base, it is obvious a trap, but when Camie’s friend is recognized as Hatchan, a former Arlong Pirate. Luffy refuses to help so Camie and Pappgu attempt the rescue by themselves. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲劇! 仮面に隠されたデュバルの真実
Tragedy! The Truth Hidden Behind Duval`s Mask!
Tragédie ! La vérité cachée derrière le masque de Duval
Higeki! Kamen ni Kakusareta Duval no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: The flying fish riders attack on the Straw Hats take place in the air and sea. Luffy is memorized by the flying fish as Zoro attempts to free Hatchan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炸裂! サニー号の超秘密兵器ガオン砲
Unleash the Sunny`s Super Secret Weapon, the Gaon Cannon!
Une grosse explosion ! La super arme secrète du Sunny : Le Graou Canon !
Sakuretsu! Sunny Gou no Chou Himitsu Heiki Gaon-hou
episode.summary: The secret of Duval is revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魚人島を目指して上陸 シャボンディ諸島
Landing on the Way to Fishman Island! The Sabaody Archipelago!
Objectif : l`île des hommes-poissons ! Arrivée sur l’archipel des Sabaody !
Gyojin-tou o Mezashite Jouriku: Sabaody Shotou
episode.summary: Enjoying takoyaki from a grateful Hatchan, he explains to the crew how to get to Fish-man Island. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暴虐! シャボンディの支配者天竜人
Tyranny! The Rulers of Sabaody, the Celestial Dragons
Quelle tyrannie ! Les dragons célestes, les maîtres de Sabaody
Bougyaku! Sabaody no Shihaisha Tenryuubito
episode.summary: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel. But it`s not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなライバル集結! 11人の超新星
New Rivals Gather! The 11 Supernovas
Les nouveaux rivaux se rencontrent ! Les 11 Supernovae
Arata na Rival Shuuketsu! 11-nin no Choushinsei
episode.summary: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters – eleven of the Grand Line`s most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy`s crew! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 標的はケイミー!! 迫る人攫い屋の魔手
The Target Is Camie! The Looming Clutches of a Professional Kidnapper
Camie est visée ! Les terribles kidnappeurs s’approchent
Hyouteki wa Camie!! Semaru Hitosaraiya no Mashu
episode.summary: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケイミーを救え 諸島に残る暗黒の歴史
Rescue Caimie: The Archipelago`s Lingering Dark History
Au secours de Camie ! Les vestiges des heures sombres de l’archipel
Camie o Sukue: Shotou ni Nokoru Ankoku no Rekishi
episode.summary: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they’ll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タイムリミット 人間[ヒューマン]オークション開幕
Time Limit: The Human Auction Begins
Le temps nous est compté. La vente aux enchères des humains a commencé
Time Limit: Human Auction Kaimaku
episode.summary: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami’s concocted a very generous plan! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鉄拳炸裂! オークションをぶっつぶせ
The Fist Explodes! Destroy the Auction
Un coup de poing explosif ! Une vente aux enchères à massacrer
Tekken Sakuretsu! Auction o Buttsubuse
episode.summary: Nami’s plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed celestial dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大パニック! オークション会場の死闘
Major Panic! Desperate Struggle at the Auction House
C’est la panique ! Grosse bagarre dans la salle des ventes
Dai Panic! Auction Kaijou no Shitou
episode.summary: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a celestial dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大将黄猿動く! 騒然シャボンディ諸島
Admiral Kizaru Takes Action! Sabaody Archipelago Thrown into Chaos
L`amiral Kizaru se déplace ! L`archipel des Sabaody est dans le chaos
Taishou Kizaru Ugoku! Souzen Sabaody Shotou
episode.summary: They saved Cami from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass Captain Kid and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 包囲網を突破せよ! 海軍VS三人の船長
Break Through the Siege! The Navy vs. the Three Captains
Briser les lignes ennemies ! La Marine contre les trois capitaines
Houimou o Toppa Seyo! Kaigun Tai Sannin no Senchou
episode.summary: The Straw Hats join forces with Kid’s crew and Trafalgar’s mates to make short work of the marines, but they’re in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロジャーとレイリー 海賊王とその右腕
Roger and Rayleigh: The King of the Pirates and His Right Hand Man
Roger et Rayleigh : le Roi des pirates et son bras droit
Roger to Rayleigh: Kaizoku Ou to Sono Migiude
episode.summary: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh’s house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger’s ship. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大将黄猿の猛攻 麦わら一味絶体絶命!
Admiral Kizaru`s Fierce Assault: The Straw Hats Face Certain Death!
L`attaque féroce de l`amiral Kizaru. Les pirates au chapeau de paille dos au mur
Taishou Kizuru no Moukou Mugiwara Ichimi Zettaizetsumei!
episode.summary: Zoro’s barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらなる強敵現る! 鉞かついだ戦桃丸
An Even Stronger Enemy Appears! The Battle Axe-Carrying Sentomaru
Un ennemi puissant de plus apparaît ! Sentômaru et sa hache à équarrir
Saranaru Kyouteki Arawaru! Masakari Katsuida Sentoumaru
episode.summary: Luffy and the Straw Hats narrowly defeat a robot that resembles one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. But before the dust settles on the field of battle, a far more deadly foe comes looking for a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 圧倒的! 海軍の戦闘兵器パシフィスタ
Overwhelming! The Navy`s Fighting Weapons, the Pacifistas
Une puissance écrasante ! Les Pacifista, les machines de guerre de la Marine
Attouteki! Kaigun no Sentou Heiki Pacifista
episode.summary: A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a warlord lookalike. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 回避不可能!? 大将黄猿の光速の蹴り!!
No Escape!? Admiral Kizaru`s Light Speed Kick!!
Un coup de pied impossible à éviter ? La vitesse-lumière de l’amiral Kizaru !
Kaihi Fukanou!? Taishou Kizaru no Kousoku no Keri
episode.summary: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 消された仲間たち 麦わら一味最後の日
Eliminated Friends: The Final Day of the Straw Hat Crew
Des compagnons qui ont disparu. Le jour où l’équipage au chapeau de paille s’est éteint
Kesareta Nakama-tachi: Mugiwara Ichimi Saigo no Hi
episode.summary: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 上陸! 男子禁制の島アマゾン・リリー
Landing! The All-Female Island, Amazon Lily
Atterrissage ! Une île interdite aux hommes, Amazon Lily
Jouriku! Danshi Kinsei no Shima Amazon Lily
episode.summary: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man’s amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時代劇特別編 破れ! スリラー商会の罠
Feudal Era Side Story: Defeat Thriller Company`s Trap
De retour à l’époque féodale ! Un piège à déjouer ! Le plan de la Thriller Company
Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Yabure! Thriller Shoukai no Wana
episode.summary: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時代劇特別編 ルフィ親分ふたたび見参
Feudal Era Side Story: Boss Luffy Appears Again
De retour à l’époque féodale ! Luffy le chef est toujours là !
Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Luffy Oyabun Futatabi Kenzan
episode.summary: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a warlord of the sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 非情の裁き! 石にされたマーガレット!!
Heartless Judgment! Margaret Is Turned to Stone!!
Un jugement impitoyable ! Margaret est transformée en pierre !
Hijou no Sabaki! Ishi ni Sareta Margaret!!
episode.summary: Boa Hancock makes Luffy fighting mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging captain Straw Hat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 背中に隠された秘密 遭遇ルフィと蛇姫
The Secret Hidden on the Backs: Luffy and the Snake Princess Meet
Un secret caché dans leur dos. Luffy et la princesse serpent se rencontrent
Senaka ni Kakusareta Himitsu: Souguu Luffy to Hebihime
episode.summary: Luffy’s search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a “drop-in” on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 急げ! 仲間たちのもとへ 女ヶ島の冒険
Hurry Back to Your Friends! The Maiden Island Adventure
Dépêche-toi de retrouver tes compagnons ! Aventure sur l`île des femmes
Isoge! Nakama-tachi no Moto e: Nyougashima no Bouken
episode.summary: An army of scantily-clad Amazonian warriors want to investigate Luffy’s family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: みんなメロメロ! 海賊女帝ハンコック
Everyone Falls in Love! Pirate Empress Hancock
Tout le monde en est amoureux ! Hancock, l`impératrice pirate
Minna Meromero! Kaizoku Jotei Hancock
episode.summary: The Amazonians chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she’s about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ大苦戦! ヘビ姉妹の覇気の力!!
A Difficult Fight for Luffy! The Snake Sisters` Haki Power!!
Duel compliqué pour Luffy ! Le pouvoir du fluide des sœurs Gorgones !
Luffy Daikusen! Hebi Shimai no Haki no Chikara!!
episode.summary: The Snake Princess pits Luffy’s Gum Gum abilities against the incredible Haki Power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エースを救え! 新たな目的地は大監獄
Saving Ace! The Next Stop: The Great Prison!
À la rescousse d`Ace ! Nouvelle destination : la grande prison
Ace o Sukue! Arata na Mokutekichi wa Daikangoku
episode.summary: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty amazons eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハンコックの告白 姉妹の忌まわしき過去
Hancock`s Confession: The Sisters` Abhorrent Past
Hancock se confesse. Le sordide passé des trois sœurs
Hancock no Kokuhaku: Shimai no Imawashiki Kako
episode.summary: News of Luffy’s run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 能力全開バトル!! ゴムゴムVSヘビヘビ
All-Out Special Power Battle!! Gum-Gum vs. Snake-Snake
Les pouvoirs à plein pot ! Gum-gum contre Gorgone
Nouryoku Zenkai Battle!! Gomugomu Tai Hebihebi
episode.summary: Luffy kicks his attack mode into second gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle’s climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋はハリケーン! メロメロハンコック
Love Is a Hurricane! Love-Love Hancock!
L`amour est un ouragan ! Hancock succombe à la passion !
Koi wa Hurricane! Meromero Hancock
episode.summary: Boa Hancock`s illness threatens to sabotage Luffy`s rescue mission; however, the Snake Princess just can`t say "no" to the rubberman, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間達の行方 島をつなぐ橋と食人植物
The Friends` Whereabouts: Bridging the Islands and Vicious Vegetations!
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. Un pont pour relier les îles et des plantes carnivores
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Shima o Tsunagu Hashi to Shokujin Shokubutsu
episode.summary: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間達の行方 巨鳥の島と桃色の楽園!
The Friends` Whereabouts: An Island of Giant Birds and a Pink Paradise!
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. L`île aux oiseaux géants et le paradis rose
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Shima to Momoiro no Rakuen!
episode.summary: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji`s refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of "girlish hearts". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間達の行方 天候の科学とからくり島
The Friends` Whereabouts: The Science of Weather and the Mechanical Island
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. La science de la météo et l`île à la super technologie
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Tenkou no Kagaku to Karakurijima
episode.summary: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間達の行方 ネガティブ王女[プリンセス]と悪魔王
The Friends` Whereabouts: A Negative Princess and the King of Demons
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. La Princesse Fantôme et le dieu du Mal
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Negative Princess to Akuma Ou
episode.summary: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決死の潜入! 海底監獄インペルダウン潜入!
A Deadly Infiltration! The Underwater Prison Impel Down
Une infiltration périlleuse ! La prison sous-marine d`Impel Down
Kesshi no Sennyuu! Kaitei Kangoku Impel Down Sennyuu!
episode.summary: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace`s execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画連動特別編[スペシャル] 決戦! ルフィVS[たい]ラルゴ
A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! Luffy vs. Largo: The Battle Is On!
Special Strong World : La bataille décisive : Luffy contre Largo
Eiga Rendou Special: Kessen! Luffy Tai Largo
episode.summary: Luffy kicks into second gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画連動特別編[スペシャル] アミーゴ海賊団の猛攻
A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! The Fierce Onslaught of the Amigo Pirates!
Special Strong World : Les Pirates Amigo donnent l`assaut
Eiga Rendou Special: Amigo Kaizokudan no Moukou
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画連動特別編[スペシャル] 狙われた小さな東の海[リトル・イーストブルー]
A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! Little East Blue in Danger!
Special Strong World : Little East Blue est pris pour cible
Eiga Rendou Special: Nerawareta Little East Blue
episode.summary: The citizens of Little East Blue throw a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画連動特別編[スペシャル] 動き出す金獅子の野望
A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! A Gold Lion`s Ambition on the Move!
Special Strong World : Les ambitions du Lion d’Or sont en marche !
Eiga Rendou Special: Ugokidasu Kinjishi no Yabou
episode.summary: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 監獄最強の男! 毒人間・マゼラン登場
The Strongest Man in the Prison! Poison Man Magellan Appears!
L`homme le plus fort de la prison ! L`apparition de Magellan, l`homme-poison
Kangoku Saikyou no Otoko! Doku Ningen Magellan Toujou
episode.summary: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren`t careful in Impel Down`s Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubberman might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison`s putrid warden! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破れ! 紅蓮地獄 バギーのド派手大作戦
Break Through the Crimson Hell! Buggy`s Chaos-Inducing Plan
Passage dans l`Enfer écarlate ! L`opération en super grandes pompes de Baggy
Yabure! Guren Jigoku: Buggy no Dohade Daisakusen
episode.summary: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down`s Crimson Hell! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地獄で再会!? バラバラの実の実力者!
A Reunion in Hell?! The Man Who Ate the Chop-Chop Fruit!
Retrouvailles en enfer ! L`homme qui a mangé le fruit de la fragmentation !
Jigoku de Saikai!? Bara Bara no Mi no Jitsuryokusha!
episode.summary: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who`s going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There`s no love lost between Buggy the Clown and the Straw Hat captain, but they`d better work together if they want to survive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 解き放たれた白鳥[スワン]! 再会! ボン・クレー
The Unleashed Swan! A Reunion with Bon Clay!
Un cygne relâché ! Les retrouvailles avec Bonclay !
Tokihanatareta Swan! Saikai! Bon Clay
episode.summary: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牢番長サルデスの罠 LV3・飢餓地獄
Chief Guard Saldeath`s Trap! Level 3: Starvation Hell!
Le piège de Saldeath, le chef des gardes. Le troisième cercle, l`enfer de la faim !
Roubanchou Saldeath no Wana: Level 3 Kiga Jigoku
episode.summary: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 囚われの王下七武海! 海侠のジンベエ
A Warlord in Prison! Jimbei, the Honorable Pirate!
Le Grand Corsaire emprisonné ! Jinbe, le paladin des mers
Toraware no Ouka Shichibukai! Kaikyou no Jinbee
episode.summary: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 署長マゼラン動く 完成! 麦わら包囲網
Warden Magellan`s Strategy! Straw Hat Entrapment Completed
Le directeur Magellan en action ! Le filet se resserre autour du chapeau de paille
Shochou Magellan Ugoku: Kansei! Mugiwara Houimou
episode.summary: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn`t count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they`ll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友達[ダチ]だから ボン・クレー決死の救出行
For His Friend! Bon Clay Goes to the Deadly Rescue!
Parce que c’est mon ami... Bonclay part à la rescousse !
Dachi Dakara: Bon Clay Kesshi no Kyuushutsukou
episode.summary: Luffy is at the end of the line - the only thing that can save him now is true friendship. But in a place like Impel Down can true friendship be found? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雌雄決す! 捨て身のルフィ最後の一撃
The Showdown Has Come! Luffy`s Desperate Last Attack!
Le combat s`achève. Luffy lance une dernière attaque au péril de sa vie !
Shiyuu Kessu! Sutemi no Luffy Saigo no Ichigeki
episode.summary: Luffy`s daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into second gear! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マゼラン強し! ボン・クレー敵前逃亡
Mighty Magellan! Bon Clay Bugs Out
La force de Magellan. Bonclay prend la fuite !
Magellan Tsuyoshi! Bon Clay Tekizen Toubou
episode.summary: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who`s deadly to the touch? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全戦力集結! LV4·焦熱地獄の決戦
All Forces Have Gathered! The Battle on Level 4, the Burning Heat Hell!
Toutes les forces se rassemblent ! Bataille décisive au quatrième cercle, l’enfer des flammes !
Zensenryoku Shuuketsu! Level 4 Shounetsu Jigoku no Kessen
episode.summary: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in a boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard`s onslaught! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奇跡を信じて! ボン・クレー魂の声援
Believe in Miracles! Bon Clay`s Cries from the Heart
Il faut croire aux miracles ! Bonclay crie de toutes ses forces !
Kiseki o Shinjite! Bon Clay Tamashii no Seien
episode.summary: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy`s still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ治療開始 イワさん奇跡の能力[ちから]!!
Luffy`s Treatment Begins! Ivan-san`s Miraculous Power!
Le traitement de Luffy commence, le pouvoir miraculeux d`Ivankov
Luffy Chiryou Kaishi: Ivan-san Kiseki no Chikara!!
episode.summary: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan`s agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地獄に楽園 インペルダウンLV5.5
A Paradise in Hell! Impel Down Level 5.5!
Un paradis en Enfer, le cinquième cercle et demi d`Impel Down
Jigoku ni Rakuen! Impel Down Level 5.5
episode.summary: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ復活! イワさん脱獄計画始動!!
Luffy`s Back! Ivan-san Begins the Breakout Plan!!
La résurrection de Luffy ! Ivankov met son plan d’évasion à exécution.
Luffy Fukkatsu! Iwa-san Datsugoku Keikaku Shidou!!
episode.summary: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he`s far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission - until he learns of Luffy`s lineage! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エース護送開始 最下層LV6の攻防!
Ace`s Convoy Begins! Battle on the Lowest Floor, Level 6!
Le transfert d`Ace ! Assaut au sixième cercle.
Ace Gosou Kaishi: Saikasou Level 6 no Koubou!
episode.summary: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan`s scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強チーム結成 震撼! インペルダウン
The Ultimate Team Has Formed! Shaking Impel Down!
Une équipe de choc : Impel Down peut trembler !
Saikyou Team Kessei: Shinkan! Inpel Down
episode.summary: Luffy`s desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらなる混乱! 黒ひげ・ティーチ襲来!
Even More Chaos! Here Comes Blackbeard Teech!
Le chaos s`accentue : L`invasion de "Barbe Noire" Teach !
Saranaru Konran! Kurohige Teach Shuurai!
episode.summary: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard`s arrival leads to the release of the prison`s most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 危険な出会い! 黒ひげと雨のシリュウ
The Dangerous Encounter! Blackbeard and Shiryu of the Rain!
Une rencontre dangereuse ! Barbe Noire et Shiryu de la Pluie
Kiken na Deai! Kurohige to Ame no Shiryuu
episode.summary: Ivan undergoes a curvaceous transformation to better battle sadistic Sadie, the commander of the Demon Guards. Meanwhile, Blackbeard and Shiryu head for a showdown on Level 1! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 7
DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 6
DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 5
DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 4
DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 3
DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 2
DVD Ad - Season 2 Part 1
DVD Ad - Season 1 Part 4
DVD Ad - Season 1 Part 3
DVD Ad - Season 1 Part 2
DVD Ad - Season 1 Part 1
(Parody of ep 1!)
意地でも倒れぬ! 本気のハンニャバル
No Price Too High! Serious Hannyabal!
Hors de question de perdre ! Hannyabal sort le grand jeu !
Iji demo Taorenu! Honki no Hannyabaru
episode.summary: Luffy`s bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say - heads will roll! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒りのJETピストル ルフィvs黒ヒゲ
Jet Pistol of Anger! Luffy vs. Blackbeard!
Le Jet Pistol en colère. Luffy contre Barbe Noire.
Ikari no Jet Pistol: Luffy vs Kurohige
episode.summary: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard`s vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マゼランを止めろ! イワさん奥義炸裂
Stop Magellan! Ivan-san`s Esoteric Technique Explodes
Il faut arrêter Magellan ! Ivankov dévoile son attaque secrète !
Magellan o Tomero! Iva-san Ougi Sakuretsu
episode.summary: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan`s toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy`s neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden`s Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マゼランの奇策! はばまれた脱獄計画
Magellan`s Tricky Move! A Foiled Escape Plan
La tactique de Magellan ! Le plan d`évasion compromis.
Magellan no Kisaku! Habamareta Datsugoku Keikaku
episode.summary: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脱獄チーム絶体絶命 禁じ手"毒の巨兵[ベノムデーモン]"
The Escapee Team in Trouble! The Forbidden Move: Venom Demon!
Les fugitifs pris au piège la technique interdite : Venom Demon.
Datsugoku Team Zettaizetsumei: Kinjite "Venom Demon"
episode.summary: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don`t return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won`t survive long enough to save Ace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間達の行方 巨鳥のヒナと桃色の対決
The Friends` Whereabouts! The Chick of a Giant Bird and a Pink Showdown!
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. Le poussin géant et une bataille rose.
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Hina to Momoiro no Taiketsu
episode.summary: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間たちの行方 空島[ウェザリア]リポートと改造動物[サイボーグアニマル]
The Friends` Whereabouts! The Weatheria Report and the Cyborg Animals!
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. Carnet de route de Weatheria et animaux cyborgs.
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Weatheria Report to Cyborg Animal
episode.summary: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目指せ海軍本部 エース救出への船出!
To the Navy Headquarters! Off to Rescue Ace!
Direction : Le quartier général de la Marine ! En route pour sauver Ace !
Mezase Kaigun Honbu: Ace Kyuushutsu e no Funade!
episode.summary: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy`s reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 起こせ最後の奇跡 正義の門を突破せよ
Come, Final Miracle! Break Through the Gate of Justice!
Accomplir un dernier miracle : Franchir la Porte de la Justice.
Okose Saigo no Kiseki: Seigi no Mon o Toppa Seyo
episode.summary: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they`re not out hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DVD Ad - Season 3 Part 1
仲間達の行方 巨大な墓標とパンツの恩
The Friends` Whereabouts! A Huge Tomb and the Panty Debt!

Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyodai na Bohyou to Pantsu no On
episode.summary: Zoro`s attempt to reunite with his friends leads him a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間達の行方 革命軍と暴食の森の罠!
The Friends` Whereabouts! Revolutionaries and the Gorging Forest`s Trap!
Des nouvelles de l`équipage. L`armée révolutionnaire et le piège de la forêt gloutonne !
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kakumeigun to Boushoku no Mori no Wana!
episode.summary: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海軍本部[マリンフォード]直前回想特別編[スペシャル] 兄弟の誓い!
A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Vow of Brotherhood!
Juste avant Marine Ford ! Les souvenirs de Luffy. La promesse des deux frères.
Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Kyoudai no Chikai!
episode.summary: While the marines prepare for Ace`s execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海軍本部直前回想特別編 集結! 三大将
A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Three Navy Admirals Come Together!
Juste avant Marine Ford ! Les souvenirs de Luffy. Les trois amiraux se rassemblent.
Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Shuuketsu! San Taishou
episode.summary: Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界を滅ぼす力! グラグラの実の能力
The Force That Could Destroy the World! The Power of the Tremor-Tremor Fruit!
Une force qui pourrait détruire le monde entier ! Le pouvoir du fruit du tremblement
Sekai o Horobosu Chikara! Guragura no Mi no Nouryoku
episode.summary: Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦の幕開け! エースと白ひげの過去
The Beginning of the War! Ace and Whitebeard`s Past!
Le début de la bataille ! Le passé d`Ace et de Barbe Blanche
Kessen no Makuake! Ace to Shirohige no Kako
episode.summary: As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard - and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巨大艦隊あらわる - 襲来! 白ひげ海賊団
A Vast Fleet Appears! Here Come the Whitebeard Pirates!

Kyodai Kantai Arawaru: Shuurai! Shirohige Kaizokudan
episode.summary: Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace`s mother in order save his life - and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes a unexpected entrance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦の刻迫る! 海軍最強の布陣完成!
Ticking Down to the Time of Battle! The Navy`s Strongest Lineup in Position!
L`heure de la bataille décisive approche ! La plus puissante armée de la Marine !
Kessen no Toki Semaru! Kaigun Saikyou no Fujin Kansei!

episode.title: Opening 7
Opening 12
Opening 11
Opening 10
Opening 13

Ending 9b (S2)
Ending 9c (S3)
Ending 9d (S4)
すべてを焼き尽くす!! 大将赤犬の能力!

episode.title: 魔人の子孫! リトルオーズJr.驀進!
A Descendent of the Beast! Little Oars Jr.: Full Speed Ahead!
Le descendant du démon ! L`assaut de Little Oz Junior !

episode.summary: A towering giant of a giant known as Little Oars Jr. carves a path of death and destruction as he fights to save Ace. The monstrous mauler is within arm`s reach of his friend when he`s intercepted by the seven warlords of the sea! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝者だけが正義 発動! センゴクの作戦!
Justice for the Winners! Sengoku`s Strategy in Action!
La justice n`appartient qu`aux vainqueurs ! Sengoku met son plan à exécution !

episode.title: 麦わらチーム到着 風雲急を告げる戦場

episode.title: 死んでも助ける ルフィVS海軍戦闘開始[バトルスタート]
Even If It Means Death! Luffy vs. the Navy: The Battle Starts!
Je te sauverai même si je dois en mourir. Luffy contre la Marine : la bataille commence
Shinde mo Tasukeru: Luffy vs Kaigun Battle Start
episode.summary: Luffy leaps into action, attacking the Naval forces with a frantic display of brutality. Meanwhile, Ace watches in horror as an army of zombies rises up to attack his brother! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激戦の連続! 能力者軍団VS能力者軍団
Hard Battles, One After Another! Devil Fruit Eaters vs. Devil Fruit Eaters!
Les combats s`enchainent ! Fruits du démon contre fruits du démon

Le changement de Kuma. Ivan se met en colère

episode.title: 殲滅作戦始動 パシフィスタ軍団の威力
The Extermination Strategy in Action! The Power of the Pacifistas!
Opération extermination. Le pouvoir destructeur des Pacifista
Senmetsu Sakusen Shidou: Pacifista Gundan no Iryoku
episode.summary: Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 赤犬の謀略! おとしいれられた白ひげ
Akainu`s Plot! Whitebeard Entrapped!
La ruse d`Akainu ! Barbe Blanche pris au piège
Akainu no Bouryaku! Otoshiirerareta Shirohige

episode.title: 包囲壁作動! 白ひげ海賊団絶体絶命!!
The Encircling Walls Activated! The Whitebeard Pirates Backed into a Corner!
Le mur d`encerclement se dresse ! Les pirates de Barbe Blanche acculés !
Houiheki Sadou! Shirohige Kaizokudan Zettaizetsumei!!

episode.title: DVD Ad - Season 3 Part 2
DVD Ad - Season 3 Part 4
最終局面突入! 白ひげ起死回生の一手
Moving into the Final Phase! Whitebeard`s Trump Card for Recovery!

episode.title: ルフィ力尽く! オリス広場の総力戦!!

episode.title: 命を削る力 テンション・ホルモン再び

episode.summary: While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a trouble youth spent seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 約束のために!! 激闘! ルフィとコビー
To Live Up to a Promise! Luffy and Coby Collide!
La force d`une promesse. Luffy et Kobby s`affrontent
Yakusoku no Tame ni!! Gekitou! Luffy to Coby

episode.title: それぞれの選んだ道 ルフィVSガープ!
Each on Different Paths! Luffy vs. Garp!
Le chemin que chacun a choisi. Luffy contre Garp !
Sorezore no Eranda Michi: Luffy vs Garp!

episode.title: 処刑台目前! 開かれたエースへの道!!
The Scaffold at Last! The Way to Ace Has Opened!

Shokeidai Mokuzen! Hirakareta Ace e no Michi!!

episode.title: エース救出! 白ひげ最後の船長命令!!
Ace Rescued! Whitebeard`s Final Order!
Ace est libéré ! Le dernier ordre de Barbe Blanche !
Ace Kyuushutsu! Shirohige Saigo no Senchou Meirei!

episode.title: 火をも焼き尽くす能力[ちから] 赤犬非情の追撃
The Power That Can Burn Even Fire! Akainu`s Ruthless Pursuit!

episode.title: 海軍本部崩壊! 白ひげ言葉なき怒り!

episode.title: DVD Ad - Season 3 Part 5

episode.title: 必死の叫び 運命を変える勇気ある数秒

episode.title: 群雄割拠す! "新しい時代"の始まり!
Mighty Leaders Face Each Other Down! Heralding the `New Era`!

episode.title: 女ヶ島上陸 ルフィを責める過酷な現実

episode.title: ルフィとエース 兄弟の出会いの物語!

Luffy to Ace: Kyoudai no Deai no Monogatari!

episode.title: 最強タッグ! 奮闘, ルフィとトリコ!
The Strongest Tag-Team! Luffy and Toriko`s Hard Struggle!
Le partenariat rêvé ! Luffy et Toriko s`affrontent !
Saikyou Tag! Funtou, Luffy to Toriko!

episode.title: サボ登場! 不確かな物の終着駅[グレイ・ターミナル]の少年

episode.title: おれは逃げない エース決死の救出作戦

episode.title: ダダン一家との別れ!? 完成! 秘密基地

episode.title: 放たれた炎 グレイ・ターミナルの危機
The Fire Has Been Set! The Gray Terminal in Crisis!

episode.summary: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end! Source: crunchyroll

episode.summary: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大虎との決戦! 船長になるのは誰だ!

Ootora to no Kessen! Senchou ni Naru no wa Dare Da!

episode.title: ルフィ弟子入り!? 海賊王と戦った男!
Luffy Becoming an Apprentice?! A Man Who Fought Against the King of the Pirates!
Luffy a trouvé son maître ! L`homme qui s`est battu contre le Roi des pirates !

episode.title: 約束を果たすため それぞれの旅立ち!
To Live Up to the Promise! Departures of Their Own!
Une promesse à tenir. Départs séparés !

episode.title: よろしく頼む! 兄弟から届いた手紙!
Take Good Care of Him! A Letter from the Brother!
Je compte sur toi ! La lettre d`un frère !

episode.title: 自由はどこにある? 少年の悲しき船出

episode.title: あいつらに会いてェ! ルフィ涙の叫び

episode.title: 麦わらの一味激震! もたらされた凶報
Straw Hats in Shock! The Bad News Has Reached Them!
L`équipage de Chapeau de Paille sous le choc ! De mauvaises nouvelles !
