episode.title: 接触! 大剣豪ミホーク ゾロ意地の死闘
Encounter! The Great Swordsman Mihawk! Zoro`s Self-Willed Deadly Struggle!
Un contact ! Qui imposera sa volonté ? Mihawk ou Zoro ?
Sesshoku! Daikengou Mihawk: Zoro Iji no Shitou
episode.summary: Zoro`s escape attempt is thwarted by a gang of sword-slinging baboon bullies, and Brook uses music to end a feud between irate islanders with unequal arms! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 船長のもとへ 空島の脱獄と冬島の事件
Back to Our Captain! A Jail Break at the Sky Island and the Incident on the Winter Island!
Retour vers notre capitaine ! Evasion de l`île céleste et incident sur l`île hivernale
Senchou no Moto e: Sorajima no Datsugoku to Fuyujima no Jiken
episode.summary: Desperate to reach Luffy, Nami risks her life to escape from an island of weather wizards. Meanwhile, Franky rides a carbonation high through the ice and snow in search of a seaworthy vessel! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥王[めいおう]レイリーとの再会 ルフィ決断の時
Reunited with Dark King Rayleigh! Decision Time for Luffy!
Retrouvailles avec Rayleigh, le seigneur des ténèbres ! Luffy prend une décision
Meiou Rayleigh to no Saikai: Luffy Ketsudan no Toki
episode.summary: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンジの受難 王国へと帰還した女王!
A Disaster for Sanji! The Queen`s Return to the Kingdom!
La passion de Sanji ! Une reine de retour en son royaume
Sanji no Junan: Oukoku e to Kikan Shita Joou!
episode.summary: Chopper hitches a ride on a giant bird, Luffy makes a shocking return to Marineford, and Sanji finds himself fighting the most beautiful man he`s ever seen! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出す海賊たち! 驚天動地の新世界
Pirates Get on the Move! Astounding New World!
Les pirates en action. Le Nouveau Monde, lieu de toutes les surprises
Ugokidasu Kaizoku-tachi! Kyoutendouchi no Shinsekai
episode.summary: Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間に届け かけめぐる大ニュース!
With Hopes It Will Reach My Friends! Big News Spreading Fast!
Une nouvelle qui fait grand bruit ! L`équipage se tient au courant
Nakama ni Todoke: Kakemeguru Dai News!
episode.summary: Luffy hopes to send a message to his mates by way of a clue hidden in a newspaper article. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders protect the Straw Hat`s ship from scandalous scavengers! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: まさかの再上陸! ルフィ海軍本部[マリンフォード]へ!
Unexpected Relanding! Luffy, to Marineford!
Un retour inattendu ! Luffy, fonce vers Marine Ford !
Masaka no Saijouriku! Luffy Marineford e!
episode.summary: Luffy, along with Jimbei and Dark King Rayleigh, causes quite the commotion upon his return to Marineford. Meanwhile, powerful pirates all across the globe wreak havoc on the innocent! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地獄を生き抜け サンジ男をかけた勝負
Living through Hell! Sanji`s Fight for His Manhood!
Sanji, le survivant de l`enfer. Un duel où sa virilité est en jeu
Jigoku o Ikinuke: Sanji Otoko o Kaketa Shoubu
episode.summary: Nami uses her feminine charms to learn about the New World weather, Franky moves into Dr. Vegapunk`s laboratory, and Sanji must fight to stay out of a cute dress! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一触即発! ルフィVS[たい]ニセルフィ
An Explosive Situation! Luffy vs. Fake Luffy!
Situation explosive ! Luffy contre le faux Luffy !
Isshokusokuhatsu! Luffy Tai Nise Luffy
episode.summary: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zoro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新章開幕 再集結! 麦わらの一味
The Beginning of The New Chapter! The Straw Hats Reunited!
Un nouveau chapitre commence ! L`équipage au Chapeau de Paille bientôt réuni !
Shinshou Kaimaku: Saishuuketsu! Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ修行開始 2年後に約束の場所で
Luffy`s Training Begins! To the Place We Promised in 2 Years!
L`entraînement de Luffy commence. A dans deux ans au point de rendez-vous.
Luffy Shugyou Kaishi: 2-nengo ni Yakusoku no Basho de
episode.summary: Dark King Rayleigh takes Luffy to a deadly, deserted island for two years of intense battle training! If the Straw Hat captain wants to survive in the New World, he`ll have to hone his hidden powers! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: まだまだ強くなる! ゾロ船長への誓い
I Will Get Much, Much Stronger! Zoro`s Pledge to His Captain!
Je deviendrai encore plus fort. La promesse de Zoro envers son capitaine
Madamada Tsuyoku Naru! Zoro Senchou e no Chikai
episode.summary: The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon, Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦闘開始! 見せろ修行の成果!
The Battle Is On! Show Them What You Got from Training!
Que la bataille commence ! Montre-nous les fruits de ton entraînement !
Sentou Kaishi! Misero Shugyou no Seika!
episode.summary: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大物集結 ニセ麦わら一味の脅威
Big Guns Assembled! The Danger of the Fake Straw Hats!
Rassemblement général ! La menace des faux Chapeaux de Paille !
Oomono Shuuketsu: Nise Mugiwara Ichimi no Kyoui
episode.summary: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky`s new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海軍出動 狙われた麦わらの一味
The Navy Has Set Out! The Straw Hats in Danger!
Le soldat de la Marine entrent en action ! L`équipage du Chapeau de Paille pris pour cible !
Kaigun Shutsudou: Nerawareta Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 14
Opening 15
Opening 15b
全員集合 ルフィ新世界への船出
Everyone Together! Luffy, Setting Out for the New World!
Tout le monde à bord ! Luffy en route pour le Nouveau Monde !
Zen`in Shuugou: Luffy Shinsekai e no Funade
episode.summary: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they`ll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they`ve made in the last two years! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 驚愕の真実 サニー号を守った男
A Suprising Fact! The Man Who Guarded the Sunny!
L`incroyable vérité. L`histoire de l`homme qui protégea le Sunny
Kyougaku no Shinjitsu: Sunny-gou o Mamotta Otoko
episode.summary: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海底火山噴火! 流されて魚人島
Undersea Volcanic Eruption! Drifting to the Fish-Man Island!
Éruption volcanique sous-marine ! Propulsés vers l’île des Hommes-Poissons !
Kaitei Kazan Funka! Nagasarete Gyojintou
episode.summary: Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 深海で遭難 逸れた麦わらの一味
Lost in the Deep Sea! The Straw Hats Get Separated!
Naufrage sous-marin. Les Chapeau de Paille séparés
Shinkai de Sounan: Hagureta Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海中の死闘 現れた大海原の悪魔
Deadly Combat Under the Sea! The Demon of the Ocean Strikes!
Lutte à mort sous les mers. Le démon des océans fait son apparition
Kaichuu no Shitou: Arawareta Oounabara no Akuma
episode.summary: The Straw Hats are attacked by a rival gang of pirates, but that may be the least of their worries. Luffy and his crew are on a collision course with a cantankerous Kraken! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魚人島上陸 うるわしき人魚たち
Landing at the Fish-Man Island! Beautiful Mermaids!
Débarquement sur l`île des Hommes-Poissons. Le chant des belles sirènes
Gyojintou Jouriku: Uruwashiki Ningyo-tachi
episode.summary: The Straw Hats finally make it to Fish-Man Island, but their reputation precedes them, leading to trouble with the New Fish-Man Pirates! Only a daring maneuver can get them out of hot water, but there`s no guarantee they`ll survive! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魚人島の王 海神ネプチューン!
The King of the Fish-Man Island! Neptune, the God of the Sea!
Le roi de l`île des Hommes-Poissons. Neptune, dieu des océans !
Gyojintou no Ou: Kaishin Neptune!
episode.summary: After reuniting with Nami, Luffy and the gang are invited to the royal palace of Neptune, god of the sea! Meanwhile, the New Fish-Man Pirates exploit the power of a designer steroid in order to terrorize humans! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魚人島滅亡!? シャーリーの予言
The Fish-Man Island Will Be Annihilated?! Sharley`s Prophecy!
L`annihilation de l`île des Hommes-Poisson ?! La prédiction de Shirley !
Gyojintou Metsubou!? Sharley no Yogen
episode.summary: After two generous donors save Sanji from death by nosebleed, Luffy and Usopp take a tour of the island. But their welcome is worn out when a mystic mermaid has a terrifying vision - that Fish-Man Island will be destroyed at the hands of a Straw Hat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 興奮爆発! サンジ生命の危機!
Excitement Blow-Out! Sanji`s Life Under Threat!
L`excitation à son comble ! Sanji en danger !
Koufun Bakuhatsu! Sanji Seimei no Kiki!
episode.summary: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄猿登場! タイガーを狙う罠!
Kizaru Appears! A Trap to Catch Tiger!
Kizaru entre en scène ! Le piège se referme sur Tiger !
Kizaru Toujou! Tiger o Nerau Wana!
episode.summary: Arlong`s violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奴隷解放の英雄 冒険家タイガー
A Hero Who Freed the Slaves! An Adventurer Tiger!
Le héros qui sauva les esclaves ! L`aventurier Tiger !
Dorei Kaihou no Eiyuu: Boukenka Tiger
episode.summary: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime`s fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蘇る因縁! ナミと魚人海賊団!
The Haunting Ties! Nami and the Fish-Man Pirates!
Des liens hantés qui refont surface ! Nami et l`équipage des Hommes-Poissons !
Yomigaeru Innen! Nami to Gyojin Kaizokudan!
episode.summary: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一味敗北!? ホーディ竜宮城制圧
The Straw Hats Defeated?! Hordy Gains Control of the Ryugu Palace!
La défaite des pirates au Chapeau de Paille !? Hody conquiert le palais Ryûgû
Ichimi Haiboku!? Hody Ryuuguujou Seiatsu
episode.summary: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they`re no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: しらほしを守れ デッケンの追撃
Keep Shirahoshi Safe! Decken Close Behind!
Protéger la princesse à tout prix ! Decken le coriace !
Shirahoshi o Mamore: Decken no Tsuigeki
episode.summary: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜宮城の決戦! ゾロVSホーディ
The Battle in the Ryugu Palace! Zoro vs. Hordy!
La bataille finale du palais Ryûgû ! Zoro contre Hody
Ryuuguujou no Kessen! Zoro Tai Hody
episode.summary: Robin ventures into the forest in search of ancient secrets, Zoro takes to the water for a slicing, dicing showdown with Hordy Jones, and Luffy is branded a royal kidnapper by an angry mob of fish folk! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ホーディ襲来 復讐計画の始まり
Hordy`s Onslaught! The Retaliatory Plan Set into Motion!
Hody passe à l`attaque ! Le début de la vengeance
Hody Shuurai: Fukushuu Keikaku no Hajimari
episode.summary: Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜宮城激震! しらほし誘拐事件
The Ryugu Palace in Shock! The Kidnapping of Shirahoshi!
Le palais Ryûgû ébranlé ! L`enlèvement de Shirahoshi
Ryuuguujou Gekishin! Shirahoshi Yuukai Jiken
episode.summary: Luffy accidentally "kidnaps" the Mermaid Princess, an old friend issues a grave warning to Chopper and Sanji, and the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare for a raid on Ryugu Palace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緊急事態発生 占拠された竜宮城
It`s an Emergency! The Ryugu Palace Is Occupied!
État d`urgence. Le palais Ryûgû est envahi.
Kinkyuu Jitai Hassei: Senkyo Sareta Ryuuguujou
episode.summary: With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 弱虫で泣き虫! 硬殻塔の人魚姫
A Coward and a Crybaby! The Princess in the Hard Shell Tower!
Trouillarde et pleurnicharde ! La princesse sirène de la tour coquille
Yowamushi de Nakimushi! Koukakutou no Ningyo Hime
episode.summary: Luffy`s lightning reflexes spare the Mermaid Princess from a grisly death, Neptune`s army attempts to apprehend the Straw Hats, and Captain Vander Decken forges a sinister undersea alliance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜宮城! 助けた鮫に連れられて
The Ryugu Palace! Taken by the Shark That They Saved!
Guidés par le requin reconnaissant ! Direction : le palais Ryûgû !
Ryuuguujou! Tasuketa Same ni Tsurerarete
episode.summary: A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再び現在へ! 動き出すホーディ
Back to the Present! Hordy Makes a Move!
De retour dans le présent. Hody passe à l`action
Futatabi Genzai e! Ugokidasu Hody
episode.summary: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 突然の悲劇! 未来を閉ざす凶弾
A Sudden Tragedy! A Gunshot Shuts Down the Future!
Tragédie ! Le coup de feu funeste
Totsuzen no Higeki! Mirai o Tozasu Kyoudan
episode.summary: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen`s mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 揺れる魚人島! 漂着した天竜人
Shaking Fish-Man Island! A Celestial Dragon Drifts In!
L`île des Hommes-Poissons ébranlée. Le dragon céleste naufragé
Yureru Gyojintou! Hyouchaku Shita Tenryuubito
episode.summary: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海賊団分裂 ジンベエVS[たい]アーロン
The Sun Pirates Split! Jimbei vs. Arlong!
Scission dans l`équipage. Jinbei vs Arlong
Kaizokudan Bunretsu: Jinbe Tai Arlong

episode.title: 英雄の最期 タイガー衝撃の真実
The Death of the Hero! A Shocking Truth of Tiger!
La fin d`un héros - Les secrets de Tiger
Eiyuu no Saigo: Tiger Shougeki no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チーム結成! チョッパーを救え
A Team Is Formed! Save Chopper
Équipe en formation ! Il faut sauver Chopper
Team Kessei! Chopper o Sukue
episode.summary: One Piece X Toriko Crossover Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: しらほしの涙! ルフィ遂に登場
Shirahoshi`s Tears! Luffy Finally Shows Up!
Les larmes de Shirahoshi. Luffy entre enfin en scène !
¡las lagrimas de shirahoshi! luffy llega al campo de batalla
Shirahoshi no Namida! Luffy Tsui ni Toujou
episode.summary: Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother`s murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 衝撃の告白 オトヒメ暗殺の真実
A Surprising Confession! The Truth Behind the Assassination of Otohime!
Une révélation tonitruante. La vérité sur l`assassinat d`Otohime
Shougeki no Kokuhaku: Otohime Ansatsu no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦始まる ギョンコルド広場!
The Battle Is On! At Conchchorde Plaza!
Le combat final commence ! La place de la Thon-Corde
Kessen Hajimaru: Gyoncorde Hiroba!
episode.summary: Hordy`s rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy`s onslaught! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ホーディの異変 凶薬の真の力!
Something Has Happened to Hordy! The True Power of the Evil Drug!
La transformation de Hody. Le véritable pouvoir de la drogue maléfique.
Hody no Ihen: Kyouyaku no Shin no Chikara!
episode.summary: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生じた亀裂! ルフィVSジンベエ
A Rift Opens Up! Luffy vs. Jimbei!
La discorde. Luffy contre Jinbe.
Shoujita Kiretsu! Luffy Tai Jinbe
episode.summary: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy`s uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out of body experience with hopes of saving his mates! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 王国激震 ネプチューン処刑指令
The Kingdom in Shock! An Order to Execute Neptune Issued!
Le royaume en danger. L`ordre d`exécuter Neptune.
Oukoku Gekishin: Neptune Shokei Shirei
episode.summary: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大技炸裂! ゾロ・サンジ出撃!
Deadly Attacks One After Another! Zoro and Sanji Join the Battle!
Pléthore de nouvelles techniques. Zoro, Sanji, à vous de jouer !
Oowaza Sakuretsu! Zoro Sanji Shutsugeki!
episode.summary: Luffy and the gang show off how much stronger they`ve become by issuing a brutal beat down to Hordy and his ferocious Fish-Man Pirates! Can anything stop the Hats? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大激突! 麦わら一味VS10万の敵
A Big Clash! The Straw Hats vs. a Hundred Thousand Enemies!
Dans la mêlée ! L`équipage au chapeau de paille contres les 100 000 ennemis !
Dai Gekitotsu! Mugiwara Ichimi VS 10 Man no Teki
episode.summary: Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘開始! ルフィVS[たい]ホーディ!
The Fierce Fight Begins! Luffy vs. Hordy!
La bataille commence ! Luffy contre Hody !
Gekitou Kaishi! Luffy Tai Hody!
episode.summary: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami`s honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 急げルフィ! しらほし絶体絶命
Hurry Up, Luffy! Shirahoshi`s Life in Jeopardy!
Shirahoshi en danger ! Ne traîne pas Luffy !
Isoge Luffy! Shirahoshi Zettaizetsumei
episode.summary: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy`s devious nature fully comes to the surface. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノア接近! 魚人島壊滅の危機!
The Noah Closing in! The Fish-Man Island Facing Destruction!
Noah s`approche ! L`île des Hommes-Poissons en danger !
Noah Sekkin! Gyojintou Kaimetsu no Kiki!
episode.summary: Luffy shows off even more new powers as he brutally pummels Hordy, but the main attraction proves to be an ancient and immense pirate ship that`s heading straight for Fish-Man Island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鉄の海賊[アイアンパイレーツ]! フランキー将軍登場
Iron Pirate! Here Comes General Franky!
Général Franky, le pirate de fer en action !
Iron Pirate! Franky Shougun Toujou
episode.summary: Franky dazzles Usopp and Chopper by transforming into a gigantic fighting robot, Hordy tries to blackmail the Kraken, and Luffy introduces his fist to the Fish-man`s face! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 初披露! サニー号の秘密兵器!
Unveiled! The Secret Weapons of the Sunny!
Les armes secrètes du Sunny ! Inauguration
Hatsu Hirou! Sunny Gou no Himitsu Heiki!
episode.summary: Hordy`s men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エピソードオブナミ 航海士の涙と仲間の絆
Episode of Nami: Tears of a Navigator and the Bonds of Friends
Episode über Nami - Die Tränen der Navigatorin. Die Verbundenheit der Kameraden.
Episode of Nami: Koukaishi no Namida to Nakama no Kizuna
大乱戦! 一味VS新魚人海賊団!
A Massive Confused Fight! The Straw Hats vs. the New Fish-Man Pirates!
Bagarre générale ! L’équipage au Chapeau de paille contre le Nouvel équipage des Hommes-Poissons
Dairansen! Ichimi Tai Shin Gyojin Kaizokudan!
episode.summary: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ渾身の一撃! 火拳銃[レッドホーク]炸裂
Luffy`s All-Out Attack! Red Hawk Blasts!
Luffy donne tout ce qu’il a. L’explosion du Red Hawk !

However, it leads in a tie between Goku, Toriko and Luffy. Meanwhile, Zoro, Zebra and Vegeta meet accidentally in a remote part of the race, and start fighting. Source: http://onepiece.fandom.com/

episode.title: 襲来! ドレスローザからの刺客

Ennemis en approche. Les tueurs venus de Dressrosa !
Shuurai! Dressrosa kara no Shikaku
episode.summary: Word of Luffy and Law`s alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: G5壊滅! ドフラミンゴ急襲!
The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo`s Sudden Attack!
Le G-5 anéanti. L’attaque éclair de Doflamingo !
G-5 Kaimetsu! Doflamingo Kyuushuu!
episode.summary: The Straw Hats set a course for Dressrosa, Law explains his alliance with Luffy, and Smoker`s refusal to reveal a secret earns him a serious beating from Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 惜別の時 パンクハザード出航!
It`s Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!
Le temps des adieux. Départ de Punk Hazard !
Sekibetsu no Toki - Punk Hazard Shukkou!
episode.summary: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 感動の再会! モモの助と錦えもん
A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin`emon!
Retrouvailles bouleversantes. Momonosuke et Kinemon !
Kandou no Saikai! Momonosuke to Kin`emon
episode.summary: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シーザーを捕獲せよ 将軍砲[ジェネラルキャノン]炸裂
Capture Caesar! General Cannon Blast!
Capturer César. Général Cannon, feu !
Caesar o Hokaku-seyo - General Canon Sakuretsu
episode.summary: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緊迫! 青キジVSドフラミンゴ
Intense! Aokiji vs. Doflamingo!
La tension monte. Aokiji contre Doflamingo !
Kinpaku! Aokiji tai Doflamingo
episode.summary: Smoker`s life is spared by the arrival of an old friend. Law reveals some shocking news about Caesar`s partnership with Doflamingo, and Momonosuke uses his youth to get cozy with Robin and Nami! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ海に死す!? 海賊同盟崩壊
Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!
Luffy disparu en mer ? La déroute de l’alliance pirate !
Luffy Umi ni Shisu!? Kaizoku Doumei Houkai
路飞海底死斗!? 海贼同盟解体
episode.summary: Breed uses his evil abilities to turn Chopper into a pet - and force Luffy and Law to fight to the death. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 消えたシーザー! 海賊同盟出撃
Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!
César disparaît. L’alliance pirate passe à l’action !
Kieta Caesar! Kaizoku Doumei Shutsugeki
episode.summary: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind. While they fear Donflamingo`s return and prepare to face him, another powerful foe lies in wait - one whose power could be their downfall! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激震! 新世界動かす大ニュース
Startling! The Big News Shakes Up the New World!
Secousses dans le nouveau monde. Une nouvelle incroyable !
Gekishin! Shinsekai Ugokasu Dai News
episode.summary: As the world reacts to Doflamingo`s shocking announcement, Law and the Straw Hats plot the next move in their daring alliance, and a face from the past returns! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大逆転! 炸裂ルフィ怒りの鉄拳
A Major Turnaround! Luffy`s Angry Iron Fist Strikes!
Renversement de situation. Luffy explose de colère !
Daigyakuten! Sakuretsu Luffy Ikari no Tekken
episode.summary: After Law discovers the secret to Breed`s power, Luffy and his old friend the Kung Fu Dugong give the animal-abusing madman a beasty beat down! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 危険な恋 踊り娘ヴァイオレット
A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl: Violet!
Amours périlleuses. Violette la danseuse!
Kiken na Koi: Odoriko Violet
episode.summary: Zoro continues his hunt for the fairy who stole his sword, Sanji is smitten by a beautiful dancer, and Luffy prepares to fight for the Devil Fruit that belonged to his brother! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 熱狂渦巻く コリーダコロシアム
Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!
Le tourbillon de la passion. Le Corrida Colosseum !
Nekkyou Uzumaku: Corrida Colosseum
episode.summary: A blind warrior lays a beat down on a gang of masked thugs, Zorro chases the thief who stole his sword, and Luffy finds himself tempted by the promise of a fiery fruit! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冒険! 愛と情熱の国ドレスローザ
Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion: Dressrosa!
Le pays de l’amour et de la passion. Aventure à Dressrosa !
Bouken! Ai to Jounetsu no Kuni Dressrosa
episode.summary: The Straw Hats and their friends set out to explore Dressrosa, a land full of beautiful women, delicious food, and live toys that walk amongst the living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 17a
超新星! 人食いのバルトロメオ
A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!
Une supernova, Bartoloméo le Cannibale !
Choushinsei! Hitokui no Bartolomeo
episode.summary: Bartolomeo and Bellamy take center stage in the latest round of the battle royal, but a slugger with a serious punch threatens to steal their thunder. Meanwhile, Luffy is targeted by an angry behemoth! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の再会 ハイエナのベラミー
The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!
Des retrouvailles fatidiques. Bellamy la Hyène !
Unmei no Saikai: Hyena no Bellamy
episode.summary: An old nemesis sees through Luffy`s disguise, Zoro finally catches up to the sword-stealing fairy, and Sanji`s skill at sniffing out snipers impresses his new lady friend! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海賊貴公子キャベンディッシュ
A Pirate Noble! Cavendish!
Le Prince des pirates Cavendish !
Kaizoku Kikoushi Cavendish
episode.summary: A gorgeous gladiator tells Luffy the story of the world`s greatest warrior, a masked mauler literally destroys the competition, and the Navy makes its presence felt! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の無名戦士! ルーシー登場
A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!
Un combattant anonyme des plus puissants. Lucy entre dans l’arène !
Saikyou no Mumei Senshi! Lucy Toujou
episode.summary: Sanji falls further under the spell of his new lady friend, and Luffy makes quite an impression as he gets to know the fighters competing for Ace`s Devil Fruit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闘魚襲来! 死の鉄橋を突破せよ
The Fishing Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!
L’attaque des poissons combattants. Franchir le pont d’acier de la mort !
Tougyo Shuurai! Shi no Tekkyou o Toppa Seyo
episode.summary: While Law, Robin, Usopp, and Caesar attempt to survive a Fighting Fish attack, Sanji learns the heartbreaking truth about the beautiful woman who stole his heart! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一撃必殺! 驚異のキング・パンチ
A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!
Un coup mortel. Le King Punch dévastateur !
Ichigeki Hissatsu! Kyoui no King Punch
episode.summary: Franky`s new robot friend promises to reveal the tragic secrets of Dressrosa, and a regal brawler prepares to throw a powerful punch that could destroy the entire colosseum! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 群雄割拠! 白熱のBブロック!
Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!
L’affrontement des rivaux. Ça chauffe dans le bloc B !
Gun`yuu Kakkyo! Hakunetsu no B Block!
episode.summary: An old enemy of Garp`s reveals Luffy`s true identity, landing the Straw Hat captain in hot water with one of his fellow competitors. Meanwhile, the battle in Block B gets supremely brutal! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冒険! 妖精の島グリーンビッ
Explore! Fairies` Island - Green Bit!
À l’aventure. Green Bit, l’île des fées !
Bouken! Yousei no Shima Green Bit
episode.summary: Luffy`s turn to fight in the epic colosseum battle draws near, Zoro has an interesting encounter with a surprisingly strong fairy, and the thoughts in Sanji`s head shock his lady captor! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒りの一撃! 巨人VSルーシー
A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!
Une colère sans limites. Le Géant contre Lucy !
Ikari no Ichigeki! Kyojin vs Lucy
episode.summary: Nami, Chopper, and Brook are grotesquely transformed by a hideous woman who fancies herself an artist. Back at the colosseum, Luffy gets serious when his new friend falls victim to a giant attack! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天地ゆるがす! 大将藤虎の実力
Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora`s Power!
La Terre et les Cieux ébranlés. La puissance de l’Amiral Fujitora !
Tenchi Yurugasu! Taishou Fujitora no Jitsuryoku
episode.summary: After his plan falls apart, Law must fight for his life against two powerful opponents. Elsewhere, Sanji bids a touching goodbye to his special lady friend, and Luffy tangles with Brutal Bull! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世紀の謀略 ドフラミンゴ動
The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!
La conspiration du siècle. Doflamingo passe à l’action !
Seiki no Bouryaku: Doflamingo Ugoku
episode.summary: Despite Sanji`s attempt to warn him, Law finds his life in danger after being ambushed by Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Luffy is unable to hide his true identity once the fists start flying! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 知られざる世界 トンタッタ王国
The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!
Un monde secret. Le royaume de Tontatta !
Shirarezaru Sekai Tontatta Oukoku
episode.summary: Sanji learns some disturbing news that could mean trouble for his friends, Luffy prepares for a fight, and Robin is captured by a village full of little people! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出撃 伝説のヒーローウソランド
Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!
En avant. Usoland, le héros légendaire !
Shutsugeki - Densetsu no Hero Usoland
episode.summary: Luffy continues his battle with Don Chinjao, Franky and Zoro are reunited in the land of the little people, and Law is wounded in a revealing, face-to-face showdown with Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光と影 ドレスローザに潜む闇!
Light and Shadow! Darkness Behind Dressrosa!
Ombre et lumière. La part obscure de Dressrosa !
Hikari to Kage - Dressrosa ni Hisomu Yami!
episode.summary: Luffy`s battle with Don Chinjao heats up, Franky learns the tragic truth behind Dressrosa`s mysterious toy population, and Robin and Usopp prepare to join their little friends in battle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説の海賊 首領・チンジャオ!
The Legendary Pirate! Don Chinjao!
Le pirate légendaire. Don Chinjao !
Densetsu no Kaizoku - Don Chinjao!
episode.summary: While Nami, Chopper, and Brook attempt to take back the Sunny, Luffy and the monstrous mauler Don Chinjao take their brutal grudge match to a legendary level! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破壊砲炸裂! ルーシー危機一髪
Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!
Le canon destructeur. Lucy au bord de la défaite !
Hakai-hou Sakuretsu! Lucy Kikiippatsu
episode.summary: Zoro and his fairy friend argue over directions, Trafalgar Law finds himself outnumbered in his battle with Doflamingo, and Luffy`s latest opponent packs an explosive punch! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激戦決着! ルーシーVSチンジャオ!
The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chinjao!
Le combat se termine. Lucy contre Chinjao !
Gekisen Kecchaku! Lucy VS Chinjao!
episode.summary: A flashback reveals the story of how Garp changed Chinjao`s world forever. Back in the present, Luffy and his opponent trade ferocious blows that literally rock the colosseum! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の超激戦区 Dブロック開戦
The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!
Dernière mêlée générale. Le Bloc D au combat !
Saigo no Chou Gekisen Ku - D Block Kaisen
episode.summary: The bloodthirsty crowd hurls insults at Rebecca as the battle of Block D begins. On the other side of the island, Law finds himself on the losing end of his battle with Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守り抜く! レベッカとおもちゃの兵隊
Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!
Je te protègerai jusqu’au bout. Rebecca et le Petit Soldat !
Mamorinuku! Rebecca to Omocha no Heitai
episode.summary: In the moments before battle, the beautiful gladiator Rebecca flashes back to the tragic events of her childhood and the toy soldier who became her constant companion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィと宿命の剣闘士レベッカ
Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate: Rebecca!
Luffy et la gladiatrice à l’étrange destinée, Rebecca !
Luffy to Shukumei no Ken Toushi Rebecca
episode.summary: During a break between battles, Luffy is attacked by an angry rival, but a beautiful gladiator with mysterious motives offers him food - and a place to rest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レベッカの死の剣! 背水の剣舞
Rebecca`s Special Attack! Back-to-the-Water Dance!
La botte mortelle de Rebecca. Danse de l’épée au bord de l’eau !
Rebecca no Shi no Ken! Haisui no Kenbu
episode.summary: Law begins a deadly, face-to-face battle with Doflamingo, Zoro enlists the aid of a star struck gladiator, and Rebecca continues to impresses Luffy with her unique fighting style! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大決戦! サンジVSドフラミンゴ
A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!
Ça va chauffer. Sanji contre Doflamingo !
Dai Kessen! Sanji VS Doflamingo
episode.summary: Sanji`s battle with Doflamingo is interrupted by Law`s sudden arrival, and Rebecca continues her impressive showing in the battle of Block D! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美剣! 白馬のキャベンディッシュ
Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!
Une si belle larme. Cavendish au blanc destrier !
Yoshiken! Hakuba no Cavendish
episode.summary: Cavendish wins over the female fans during the Block D battle, Luffy keeps an eye on Rebecca, and Sanji heads toward a heated collision with Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦! ジョーラVS麦わらの一味
A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!
Combat décisif. Jora contre l`équipage au Chapeau de Paille !
Kessen! Joura vs Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: Brook`s trickery springs the Straw Hats from their artistic prison, but their failure to cuff the culprit means they`ll need help from a cola-powered cannon to emerge victorious! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワンピース"3D2Y" エースの死を越えて! ルフィ仲間との誓い
One Piece "3D2Y": Overcoming Ace`s Death! The Oath with Luffy`s Crewmates!
One Piece "3D2Y" Überwinde Ace`s Tod - Das Gelübde der Kameraden
One Piece "3D2Y": Ace no Shi o Koete! Luffy Nakama to no Chikai
衝撃! おもちゃの兵隊の正体!
A Big Surprise! A True Identity of the Toy Soldier!
Révélation. La vérité sur le Soldat jouet !
Shougeki! Omocha no Heitai no Shoutai!
episode.summary: Rebecca`s battle continues, a madman turns a gladiator into a play thing, and the brave little toy soldier reveals his painful past – and the tragic truth behind King Riku`s fall from power! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最凶の戦士! ローガンVSレベッカ
The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!
Le clash des grands guerriers. Logan contre Rebecca !
Saikyou no Senshi! Logan vs Rebecca
episode.summary: Luffy learns the truth about life in Dressrosa under Doflamingo`s reign. Meanwhile, Rebecca needs help from a friend to survive her bone-crushing battle with Logan! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 両雄相まみえる! 麦わらと天夜叉
Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!
La confrontation. Le Chapeau de Paille contre le Démon Céleste !
Ryouyuu Aimamieru! Mugiwara to Ten Yasha
episode.summary: Luffy sets his sights on a showdown with Doflamingo in a desperate attempt to save Law`s life. Sanji, Nami, Chopper, and Brook are attacked by a very deadly foe! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 七武海対決 ローVSドフラミンゴ
A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!
Le choc des Grands Corsaires. Law contre Doflamingo !
Shichibukai Taiketsu Law VS Doflamingo
episode.summary: Law`s power begins to fade, making him an easy target for Doflamingo`s vicious attacks. Meanwhile, Franky begs Luffy to let him fight alongside Soldier and the little people! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪夢! ドレスローザ悲劇の一夜
A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!
Cauchemar. Nuit tragique à Dressrosa !
Akumu! Dressrosa Higeki no Ichiya
episode.summary: Rebecca continues her valiant stand in the arena of battle, Luffy is reunited with Zoro, and the heartbreaking story of how Doflamingo conquered Dressrosa continues! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦慄の過去! ドレスローザの秘密
A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!
Un effroyable passé. Le sombre passé de Dressrosa !
Senritsu no Kako! Dressrosa no Himitsu
episode.summary: Luffy learns the truth about life in Dressrosa under Doflamingo`s reign. Meanwhile, Rebecca needs help from a friend to survive her bone-crushing battle with Logan! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: SOP作戦開始 ウソランド突撃
Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!
Début de l’opération S.O.P. Usoland entre en scène !
SOP Sakusen Kaishi: Usoland Totsugeki
episode.summary: Usopp and Robin join the little people on their mission to turn the toys back into humans, Franky wreaks havoc at the toy house, and Rebecca continues her gladiator battle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ驚愕 エースの意志を継ぐ男
Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace`s Will!
Une surprise de taille pour Luffy. L’héritier de la volonté d’Ace !
Luffy Kyougaku: Ace no Ishi o Tsugu Otoko
episode.summary: Soldier reveals his daring plan to return all the toys to their human forms, and Luffy has an emotional encounter with someone from his very distant past! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 17b
熱き思い レベッカVSスレイマン
A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!
Se battre pour quelqu`un. Rebecca contre Suleyman !
Atsuki Omoi - Rebecca vs. Suleiman
episode.summary: Zoro attracts unwanted attention by upsetting a child, Soldier risks his life to lead the attack on Doflamingo, and Rebecca struggles to survive the brutal battle of Block D! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決勝開始 英雄ディアマンテ登場
The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!
Que la finale commence. Diamante le héros entre en scène !
Kesshou Kaishi: Eiyuu Diamante Toujou
episode.summary: Diamante`s unique abilities and the presence of special Fighting Fish add a deadly wrinkle to the tournament`s final round. Elsewhere, Luffy spoils any chance of sneaking up on Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大将の決断 藤虎VSドフラミンゴ
The Admiral`s Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!
L’Amiral prend une décision. Fujitora contre Doflamingo !
Taishou no Ketsudan - Fujitora vs. Doflamingo
episode.summary: Franky has his hands full battling a host of enemies at the Toy House, Violet leads Luffy to a secret entrance into the palace, and Fujitora issues Doflamingo a grave warning! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝者決定!? Dブロック衝撃の結末
The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!
Nous avons un vainqueur. Fin des combats dans le bloc D !
Shousha Kettei!? D Block Shougeki no Ketsumatsu
episode.summary: Rebecca survives an encounter with an opponent`s deadly alter ego, Franky continues his battle with a man who dresses like a baby, and Violet offers to sneak Luffy into the palace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動く城! 最高幹部ピーカ出現
A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!
Un château qui bouge. Pica, le redoutable lieutenant !
Ugoku Shiro! Saikou Kanbu Pica Shutsugen
episode.summary: Luffy tangles with a monster made of stone, Franky bursts into flames after getting shot by a cannon, and the courageous little people hatch a plan to turn the toys back into humans! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の光 我らが隊長の秘密!
The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!
Dernière lueur d’espoir. Le secret de notre chef !
Saigo no Hikari: Warera ga Taichou no Himitsu!
episode.summary: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol’s furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier’s stunning true identity! Meanwhile, with the help of another Tontatta group, the Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 打倒シュガー 小人の兵隊突撃!
Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!
À bas Sugar. L’armée Tontatta passe à l’action !
Tatou Sugar: Kodomo no Heitai Totsugeki!
episode.summary: Zoro repeatedly slices his stone opponent into pieces, but he can`t find a way to make the bad guy stay down. Meanwhile, the bravery of the little people could get them turned into toys! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜の爪炸裂! ルーシー脅威の一撃!
Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy`s Intimidating Attack!
La Griffe du Dragon. La plus puissante attaque de Lucy !
Ryuu no Tsume Sakuretsu! Lucy Kyoui no Ichigeki!
episode.summary: Soldier takes a beating from a Doflamingo Family Executive, Lucy shows off a powerful new fighting style, and Zoro pushes his blades to the breaking point in a showdown with a man made of stone! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 作戦失敗! 英雄ウソランド死す!?
The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!
Échec total. Usoland mordra-t-il la poussière ?
Sakusen Shippai! Eiyuu Usoland Shisu!?
episode.summary: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo`s chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy, and all hopes rest on Usopp to provide the miracle everyone needs! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の出会い キュロスとリク王
A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!
Une rencontre historique. Kyros et le roi Riku !
Unmei no Deai: Kyros to Riku Ou
episode.summary: The deep and tragic story of Kyros is revealed! The legend of this invincible gladiator is tied up with the royal family of Dressrosa! Meanwhile, Trebol`s defeat at the hands of Usopp is not a sure thing yet! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソつきウソランド逃走中!
A Liar! Usoland on the Run!
Menteur, menteur. Usoland se débine !
Usotsuki Usoland Tousouchuu!
episode.summary: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others all busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol? Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make - run and fight another day or face his own doom and challenge Trebol! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破裂[パンク]人間 グラディウス大爆発!
The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!
Un pouvoir détonant. Gladius explose tout !
Panku Ningen: Gladius Dai Bakuhatsu!
episode.summary: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly-indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪魔の罠 ドレスローザ殲滅作戦
The Devil`s Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!
Une piège démoniaque. Bain de sang à Dressrosa !
Akuma no Wana: Dressrosa Senmetsu Sakusen
episode.summary: The mystery of Doflamingo`s return from the dead is revealed! But there isn`t much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 颯爽登場 革命軍参謀総長サボ!
Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army, Sabo!
Une arrivée fracassante. Sabo l’officier Révolutionnaire !
Sassou Toujou: Kakumeigun Sanbou Souchou Sabo!
episode.summary: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his new-found followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo`s defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos, but the Young Master may have a trick left up his sleeve... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 火拳炸裂! 復活メラメラの実の力
The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!
L’explosion du poing ardent. Le pouvoir du Pyro-fruit est de retour !
Kaken Sakuretsu! Fukkatsu Meramera no Mi no Chikara
episode.summary: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo’s clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring! Will he be able to snag the Flare-Flare Fruit? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説復活! キュロス渾身の一撃
The Legend Is Back! Kyros` All-out Blow!
La légende renaît. Kyros s’élance à corps perdu
Densetsu Fukkatsu! Kyros Konshin no Ichigeki
episode.summary: Usopp manages to knock Sugar out and Operation SOP is accomplished! The toys in Dressrosa start turning back to their original forms and the people are slowly realizing who Doflamingo really is! In the meantime, the legendary hero Kyros reverts to his true form - and this mighty champion of the Colosseum has a score to settle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大集結! ルフィと凶悪戦士軍団
Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!
Tout le monde sur le pont. Luffy et les affreux !
Daishuuketsu! Luffy to Kyouaku Senshi Gundan
episode.summary: With Luffy and the others recovering from Pica`s attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out - to decide who gets to take down Doflamingo once and for all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大地鳴動 破壊神巨大ピーカ降臨
With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!
La Terre et le Ciel ébranlés. Pica le géant destructeur !
Daichi Meidou: Hakai Kami Kyoudai Pica Kourin
episode.summary: Robin, Usopp, the Tontatta`s and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo`s deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin`emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town and changes the stakes of the game! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵陣突破 ルフィ・ゾロ反撃開始
Breaking Through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!
Brisez les lignes ennemies. Luffy et Zoro contre-attaquent !
Tekijin Toppa: Luffy Zoro Hangeki Kaishi
episode.summary: Doflamingo and Fujitora`s agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace along with Zoro and Law, Fujitora stands in his way! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 五億の男 狙われたウソランド!
The 500 Million Berry Men! Target: Usoland!
L’Homme qui valait 500 millions. Usoland dans le collimateur !
Go-oku no Otoko: Nerawareta Usoland!
episode.summary: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game - targeting Luffy, King Riku, and Law, but with the highest bounty reserved for Usopp! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命 罠にかかったルフィ!
A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!
Situation désespérée. Luffy est pris au piège !
Zettaizetsumei: Wana ni Kakatta Luffy!
episode.summary: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas to catch up with Luffy and Law! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大激突! 参謀総長サボVS大将藤虎
A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!
Un duel de choc. Sabo le chef d`État-Major contre l`Amiral Fujitora !
Daigekitotsu! Sanbou Souchou Sabo vs Taishou Fujitora
episode.summary: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo`s refuge, making his way through Doflamingo`s guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit! But with Fujitora`s ability to call down a meteor, will Sabo have to power to save himself? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 衝撃告白! ロー熱き魂の誓い!
A Shocking Confession! Law`s Soulful Vow!
Un aveu déconcertant. Le serment exalté de Law !
Shougeki Kokuhaku! Law Atsuki Tamashii no Chikai!
episode.summary: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law`s handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him. Finally, Law`s reason for despising Doflamingo is revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 快進撃! ルフィ軍団VSピーカ!
Steady Progress! Luffy`s Army vs. Pica!
L’assaut est lancé ! L’armée de Luffy contre Pica !
Kaishingeki! Luffy Gundan vs Pica!
episode.summary: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica’s giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action, summoning all the Navy soldiers on the island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奮闘とのピーカ ゾロ一とどめの一撃
A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro`s Deadly Attack!
Un combat acharné contre Pica. L`attaque mortelle de Zoro !
Funtou to no Pica: Zoro Ichi Todome no Ichigeki
episode.summary: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Señor Pink. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人目の侍 夕立ちカン十郎登場
The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!
Le second samouraï. Kanjuro la Douche du Soir apparaît
Futarime no Samurai: Yuudachi Kanjuurou Toujou
episode.summary: Hidden far underground, Kin`emon finds his old friend Kanjuro, whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along - and that the only way to win is to take the Warlord down! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 共同戦線 ルフィ勝利への突破口
A United Front! Luffy`s Breakthrough to the Victory!
Un front uni. La percée de Luffy vers la victoire
Kyoudousensen: Luffy Shouri e no Toppakou
episode.summary: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other`s necks towards a unified plan, which might just be enough to get Luffy the chance to make it to a final showdown with Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大脱出! ルフィ起死回生の象銃[エレファントガン]
A Great Escape! Luffy`s Tide-Turning Elephant Gun!
Une grande évasion ! L`Eléphant Gun de Luffy qui fait tourner la roue
Daidasshutsu! Luffy Kishikaisei no Elephant Gun
episode.summary: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum to defend himself and protect Robin and Rebecca! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 18
涙の再会 レベッカとキュロス
A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!
D`émouvantes retrouvailles. Rebecca et Kyros !
Namida no Saikai: Rebecca to Kyros
episode.summary: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo -- but Sugar stands in their way! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 命かけて! ルフィは勝利の切り札
Risking Their Lives! Luffy Is the Trump Card for Victory!
Au péril de leur vie ! Luffy est l`atout pour la victoire
Inochi Kakete! Luffy wa Shouri no Kirifuda
episode.summary: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process? Meanwhile, Sabo tastes Fujitora`s full might! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不死身! 恐怖の頭割り人形軍団
Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!
Invincible ! La terrible armée de poupées casses-têtes
Fujimi! Kyoufu no Atamawari Ningyou Gundan
episode.summary: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below - and directly into Luffy and the others` battle with the creepy Headcracker Dolls! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小人の姫 囚われたのマンシェリー
The Little People`s Princess! Captive Mansherry!
La princesse des Nains. Mancherie prisonnière
Kobito no Hime: Toraware no Mansherry
episode.summary: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky while Señor Pink, wise to Frankie`s deception, arrives on the scene ready for a manly showdown! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 究極の力 オペオペの実の秘密!
The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!
Le pouvoir ultime. Le véritable secret du Ope Ope no Mi !
Kyuukyoku no Chikara: Op-Op no Jitsu no Himitsu!
episode.summary: With Fujitora`s stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 気高き一族 ドフラミンゴの正体!
A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!
Une famille noble. La véritable identité de Doflamingo !
Kedakaki Ichizoku! Doflamingo no Shoutai!
episode.summary: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora’s true intention… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒り爆発 ルフィ・ロー最強の秘策
Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law`s Ultimate Stratagem!
La colère explose. Luffy et Law, l`ultime stratagème
Ikari Bakuhatsu: Luffy Law Saikyou no Hisaku
episode.summary: The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy`s own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Señor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一撃必殺 ドレスローザを救う男
One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!
Un coup mortel. L`homme qui sauva Dressrosa
Ichigeki Hissatsu: Dressrosa o Sukuu Otoko
episode.summary: Usopp uses Viola`s Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster -- and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp`s ammunition has been specially designed for this specific situation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時迫る! オペオペの実を奪え!
The Time Is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!
Le compte à rebours est lancé ! S`emparer du Ope Ope no Mi !
Toki Sameru! Op-Op no Mi o Ubae!
episode.summary: Corazon`s double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 苦難の道 ローとコラソン命の旅
A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon`s Journey of Life!
Un chemin ardu. Le périple de Law et Corazon
Kunan no Michi: Law to Corazon Inochi no Tabi
episode.summary: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon`s actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天竜人! ドフィの壮絶なる過去
A Celestial Dragon! Doffy`s Stormy Past!
Un tenryûbito ! Le passé tumultueux de Doffy
Tenryuubito! Doffy no Souzetsu Naru Kako
episode.summary: Law`s attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he`s accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon`s mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law`s life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲しき記憶 白い町の少年ロー!
Sad Memories! Law the Boy from the White Town!
Tristes souvenirs. Law, le gamin de la Ville Blanche !
Kanashiki Kioku: Shiroi Machi no Shounen Law!
episode.summary: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law`s traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: One Piece Recap
episode.summary: A recap OVA summarizing the ten-year TV series up to the Impel Down arc.

episode.title: 熱き闘い ローVSドフラミンゴ
An Intense Battle! Law vs. Doflamingo!
Un combat intense. Law vs. Doflamingo
Atsuki Tatakai: Law vs Doflamingo
episode.summary: Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自由へ! ロー注射[インジェクション]ショット炸裂
To Be Free! Law`s Injection Shot Blasts!
Pour la liberté ! Law délivre un Injection Shot
Jiyuu e! Law Injection Shot Sakuretsu
episode.summary: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it`s Law`s revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 行けロー 優しき男最期の戦い!
Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man`s Final Fight!
Va de l`avant Law. Le combat final d`un homme bienveillant !
Yuke Law: Yasashiki Otoko Saigo no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Doflamingo and his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law`s whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape - even if that means sacrificing his own life. However, when things turn sour, it`s a chain of lucky coincidences that allows the plan to be set into motion - almost as though someone or something is keeping Law alive! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覚悟の時 コラソン別れの笑顔!
The Moment of Resolution! Corazon`s Farewell Smile!
L`instant de résolution. Le sourire d`adieu de Corazon !
Kakugo no Toki: Corazon Wakare no Egao!
episode.summary: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon`s hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island; the location of Corazon and Law! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エピソードオブサボ ~3兄弟の絆 奇跡の再会と受け継がれる意志~
Episode of Sabo: The Three Brothers` Bond - The Miraculous Reunion and the Inherited Will
Episode über Sabo - Das Band der 3 Brüder, die wundersame Wiedervereinigung und die vererbte Entschlossenheit
Episode of Sabo: 3-kyoudai no Kizuna - Kiseki no Saikai to Uketsugareru Ishi
episode.summary: After two years of training, the Straw Hats reunited at Sabaody Archipelago. Getting past the Fish-Man Island, they finally made it to the final sea – the New World. At Punk Hazard Island, they met Trafalgar Law again by accident who suggested them to form a “pirate alliance” with him in order to take down the Four Emperors, which they accepted, and together with Law, they went for Doflamingo who is connected to the Four Emperors. They entered Dressrosa, the country Doflamingo reigns over, and got into action according to Law’s instruction but Luffy suddenly decided to enter a competition which prize was his late brother Ace’s Flare-Flare Fruit under the name Lucy, and made it to the final. Meanwhile, Law fell for Doflamingo’s trap and got captured. At the same time, the Straw Hats learned the “darkness” of the country from a toy soldier who they met on their way. Becoming furious about Doflamingo’s dirty trick, they joined the Little People to fight to take back freedom. Luffy was competing in the Colosseum but to rescue Law, he was trying to get out of there and that’s when Sabo who he thought was dead, showed up… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 疾風怒濤 ハクバVS[たい]デリンジャー
A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!
Tempête et tension. Hakuba vs. Dellinger
Shippuudotou: Hakuba tai Dellinger
episode.summary: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger’s horrible true nature! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の意地 ベラミー最期の突撃!
The Man`s Pride! Bellamy`s Last Charge!
La fierté d`un homme. La dernière charge de Bellamy !
Otoko no Iji: Bellamy Saigo no Totsugeki!
episode.summary: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛の決戦 新棟梁サイVS[たい]ベビー5
The Battle of Love! The New Leader Sai vs. Baby 5!
Le combat de l`amour. Le nouveau leader Sai vs. Baby 5
Ai no Kessen: Shintouryou Sai tai Baby 5
episode.summary: Lao G and Don Chin Jao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chin Jao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幹部決戦 誇り高きハイルディン
A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!
Une bataille décisive contre les officiers. Le fier Hajrudin
Kanbu Kessen: Hokori Takaki Hajrudin
episode.summary: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo`s control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死の星屑 ディアマンテ猛攻の嵐
Stardust of Death! Diamante`s Storm of Vicious Attacks!
Poussière d`étoiles mortelles. Le déluge d`attaques de Diamante
Shi no Hoshikuzu: Diamante Moukou no Arashi
episode.summary: Franky and Señor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner`s sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess even in near defeat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の決闘 セニョール愛の挽歌
The Manly Duel! Senor`s Elegy of Love!
Le duel des hommes. L`élégie d`amour de Señor
Otoko no Kettou: Senor Ai no Banka
episode.summary: Señor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Señor`s tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry`s rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 癒しの姫 マンシェリーを救え!
The Healing Princess! Save Mansherry!
La princesse guérisseuse. Au secours de Mancherie !
Iyashi no Hime: Mansherry o Sukue!
episode.summary: Princess Mansherry`s amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who`ve gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance! It`s up to Leo to save the day! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バリバリ オマージュ神拳発動!
Barrier-Barrier! Homage God Fist Strikes!
Bari-Bari. L`attaque de l`hommage du poing de dieu !
Baribari: Homage Shinken Hatsudou!
episode.summary: Bartolomeo is in a neck and neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish, but his evil aspect Hakuba keeps complicating the situation more! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あばよ! ベラミー別れの一撃!
So Long! Bellamy`s Farewell Blow!
A plus ! Le coup d`adieu de Bellamy !
Abayo! Bellamy Wakare no Ichigeki!
episode.summary: Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy`s hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空中決戦 ゾロ新必殺奥義炸裂!
A Decisive Battle in Midair! Zoro`s New Special Secret Technique Blasts!
Combat aérien décisif. La nouvelle botte secrète explosive de Zoro !
Kuuchuu Kessen: Zoro Shin Hissastsu Ougi Sakuretsu!
episode.summary: With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others on the old King`s Plateau in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica`s near-unstoppable onslaught. Meanwhile, King Riku ponders what it means to be a good king. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大地横断 巨像ピーカ奇襲作戦!
Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica`s Surprise Maneuver!
La grande marche. La manœuvre surprise de Pica, la statue géante !
Daichi Oudan: Kyozou Pica Kishuu Sakusen!
episode.summary: Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雷の破壊剣[トゥルエノバスタード] キュロス怒りの一撃
Trueno Bastardo! Kyros` Furious Strike!
Trueno bastardo ! L`assaut furieux de Kyros !
Trueno Bastardo: Kyros Ikari no Ichigeki
episode.summary: Kyros, unbowed by Diamante`s vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain, setting the stage for the Straw Hats` victory. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 攻撃不能 トレーボル衝撃の秘密
Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!
Invulnérable. Le secret renversant de Trebol
Kougeki Funou: Trebol Shougeki no Himitsu
episode.summary: Trebol`s wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo`s game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覇気激突 ルフィVS[たい]ドフラミンゴ
A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!
Confrontation brutale de haki. Luffy vs. Doflamingo
Haki Gekitotsu: Luffy tai Doflamingo
episode.summary: Law`s attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo`s power has depths which he and Luffy haven`t bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 執念の刃 逆襲のガンマナイフ!
A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!
Une lame de ténacité. Le Ganma Knife de la contre-attaque !
Shuunen no Yaiba: Gyakushuu no Gamma Knife!
episode.summary: The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロー死す ルフィ憤怒の猛攻撃!
Law Dies! Luffy`s Raging Onslaught!
Law est mort. La violente attaque enragée de Luffy !
Law Shisu: Luffy Fundo no Moukougeki!
episode.summary: Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law`s lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワンピース ~アドベンチャー オブ ネブランディア~
One Piece: Adventure of Nebulandia
Abenteuer auf Nebulandia
One Piece: Adventure of Nebulandia
episode.summary: Adventure of Nebulandia is a TV special of the One Piece anime. The special has the Straw Hat Pirates fight Foxy again in the New World, on Mushroom Island. This soon gives way to a battle against the Marines on an island called Nebulandia that can nullify Devil Fruit powers.

episode.title: ルフィ! 渾身の獅子[レオ]バズーカ
Luffy! An All-Out Leo Bazooka!
Luffy ! Leo Bazooka à pleine puissance
Luffy! Konshin no Leo Bazooka
episode.summary: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大逆襲! ドフラミンゴの覚醒!
A Massive Counterattack! Doflamingo`s Awakening!
La grande contre-attaque ! L`éveil de Doflamingo !
Daigyakushuu! Doflamingo no Kakusei!
episode.summary: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people; survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family - Doflamingo himself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギア4[フォース]! 驚異のバウンドマン!
Fourth Gear! The Phenomenal Bounce-Man!
Gear 4 ! L`incroyable Bound-Man !
Gear Fourth! Kyoui no Bounce Man!
episode.summary: Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy`s Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒り爆発 おれが全部引き受ける
Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything Upon Myself!
Explosion de colère. Je prendrai tout sur moi
Ikari Bakuhatsu: Ore ga Zenbu Hikiukeru
episode.summary: Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren`t working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生か死か 運命のカウントダウン
Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!
Mort ou vif. Le compte à rebours du destin
Sei ka Shi ka: Unmei no Countdown
episode.summary: Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry`s powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 命の限り 死の鳥カゴを止めろ!
As Long As We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!
Jusqu`à la mort. Arrêter la mortelle Cage à Oiseaux !
Inochi no Kagiri: Shi no Tori Kago o Tomero!
episode.summary: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奇跡の涙 マンシェリーの戦い!
Tears of Miracles! Mansherry`s Fight!
Les larmes du miracle. Le combat de Mancherie !
Kiseki no Namida: Mansherry no Tatakai!
episode.summary: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats` allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 火炎竜王 ルフィの命を守りぬけ
Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy`s Life!
Roi Dragon de Feu. Protège la vie de Luffy
Kaen Ryuuou: Luffy no Inochi o Mamorinuke
episode.summary: Bounce-man`s power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment to defend his brother, Luffy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激震走る 動き出す最悪の世代!
Sending a Shockwave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!
La terre tremble. La pire génération commence à bouger !
Gekishin Hashiru: Ugokidasu Saiaku no Sedai!
episode.summary: Repercussions of Doflamingo`s defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora`s actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 前代未聞 大将藤虎衝撃の決断!
The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitora`s Surprising Decision!
Sans précédent. La décision inattendue de l`amiral Fujitora !
Zendaimimon: Taishou Fujitora Shougeki no Ketsudan!
episode.summary: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace`s final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown when Navy Admiral Fujitora steps in and takes a stunning action! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自由へ! 喜びのドレスローザ!
To Be Free! Dressrosa`s Delight!
Pour la liberté ! le soulagement de Dressrosa !
Jiyuu e! Yorokobi no Dressrosa!
episode.summary: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they`ve endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天を討つ ルフィ怒りの大猿王銃[キングコングガン]
Attack on a Celestial! Luffy`s King Kong Gun of Anger!
L`attaque du ciel. Le King Kong Gun de la colère de Luffy
Ten o Utsu: Luffy Ikari no King Kong Gun
episode.summary: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 藤虎動く 麦わらの一味完全包囲網
Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!
Fujitora avance. Le siège parfait des Mugiwara
Fujitora Ugoku: Mugiwara no Ichimi Kanzen Houimou
episode.summary: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca`s history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の生物 四皇・百獣のカイドウ
The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors: Kaido, King of the Beasts!
La créature la plus forte. Le Yonkou Kaido aux cent bêtes
Saikyou no Seibutsu: Yonkou - Hyakujuu no Kaidou
episode.summary: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄弟の絆 ルフィ・サボ再会秘話
The Brothers` Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo`s Reunion!
Le lien fraternel. L`histoire cachée derrière les retrouvailles de Luffy et Sabo
Kyoudai no Kizuna: Luffy Sabo Saikai Hiwa
episode.summary: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy`s favor! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説誕生 革命戦士サボの冒険!
The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!
La naissance de la légende. Les aventures de Sabo le guerrier révolutionnaire !
Densetsu Tanjou: Kakumei Senshi Sabo no Bouken!
episode.summary: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逃場無し 大将藤虎非情の追撃!
No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora`s Ruthless Pursuit!
Aucune échappatoire. La traque impitoyable de l`amiral Fujitora !
Nigeba Nashi: Taishou Fujitora Hijou no Tsuigeki!
episode.summary: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora`s strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story of the Straw Hat Pirates! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の意地 ルフィVS[たい]藤虎真向勝負
Men`s Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!
La volonté d`un homme. Luffy vs. Fujitora, l`affrontement
Otoko no Iji: Luffy tai Fujitora Makkou Shoubu
episode.summary: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law`s name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父娘[おやこ]の絆 キュロスとレベッカ!
The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!
Le lien entre un père et une fille. Kyros et Rebecca !
Oyako no Kizuna: Kyros to Rebecca!
episode.summary: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy`s lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 非常事態 さらわれたレベッカ!
A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!
Situation d`urgence. L`enlèvement de Rebecca !
Hijoujitai: Sarawareta Rebecca!
episode.summary: Fujitora`s flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island, but not without finishing up a piece of business... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 銀の要塞 ルフィとバルト大冒険
The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto`s Great Adventure!
La forteresse d`argent. La grande aventure de Luffy et Barto
Gin no Yousai: Luffy to Barto Daibouken
episode.summary: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy’s appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 群雄割拠 荒狂う新世界の怪物達
The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World
L`affrontement des rivaux. Les monstres du Nouveau Monde se déchaînent
