Gun`yuukakyo: Arekuruu Shinsekai no Kaibutsu-tachi
episode.summary: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 子分の盃 結成! 麦わら大船団!
Sons` Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet Is Formed!
La coupe de sake des partisans. Formation ! La grande flotte des Mugiwara !
Kobun no Sakazuki: Kessei! Mugiwara Daisendan!
episode.summary: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冒険開幕 幻の島「ゾウ」到着!
Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!
Le rideau se lève sur une nouvelle aventure. Arrivée sur l`île fantôme, Zō !
Bouken Kaimaku: Maboroshi no Shima "Zou" Touchaku!
episode.summary: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命 ルフィ極限の灼熱決戦
A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!
Situation désespérée. Le combat décisif de Luffy dans une chaleur extrême
Zettaizetsumei: Luffy Kyokugen no Shakunetsu Kessen
episode.summary: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill`s self-serving aims and turning his gang against him? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 剣技白熱 ロー・ゾロ遂に見参!
The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!
La technique à l`épée explose. Law et Zoro, prêts pour la rencontre finale !
Kengi Hakunetsu: Law Zoro Tsui ni Kenzan!
episode.summary: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill`s assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地下迷宮 ルフィVS[たい]トロッコ人間
An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!
Le labyrinthe souterrain. Luffy vs. l`homme-wagon
Chika Meikyuu: Luffy tai Torokko Ningen
episode.summary: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill`s group hides a terrible secret! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 19a
ガルチュー! 麦わらの一味再集結
Garchu! The Straw Hats Reunite!
Garchu. L`équipe des Mugiwara au complet
Garchuu! Mugiwara no Ichimi Saishuuketsu
episode.summary: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou. They continue on towards the fortress learning more about the mysterious Mink Tribe, and are finally reunited with the others - but is that the whole story? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦闘開始 ルフィVSミンク族!
A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!
La bataille commence. Luffy vs. la tribu Mink !
Sentou Kaishi: Luffy vs Mink-zoku!
episode.summary: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant’s back, but he`s treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決死の登象 巨象の背の大冒険!
A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!
Une ascension d`éléphant mortelle. Une grande aventure à dos d`éléphant !
Kesshi no Tozou: Kyozou no Se no Daibouken!
episode.summary: Finally scaling the elephant`s back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新七武海 伝説・白ひげの息子登場
The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard`s Son Appears!
Le nouveau Shichibukai. Le fils légendaire de Barbe Blanche apparaît
Shin Shichi Bukai: Densetsu Shirohige no Musuko Toujou
episode.summary: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワンピース ハートオブゴールド
One Piece: Heart of Gold
One Piece: Heart of Gold
episode.summary: While Exploring the New World, Luffy and the members of the Straw Hats meets a mysterious girl named Olga. She is pretty on the outside but twisted and savage inside and she told them she is chased by the Navy and a powerful treasure hunter named Mad Treasure. The reason she is targeted is because she was from Alchemi, an island of steel which suddenly disappeared two centuries ago. Rumor has it that the metal called the Pure Gold that was created on the island is worth a fortune – that you can even buy the whole world with it. Thus, people have been seeking it from long ago. Olga managed to escape from Alchemi by accident but was caught by the Navy, and the Navy Headquarters and Mad Treasure who is working on orders from Guild Tesoro, the lord of the underground community, came to notice that there was a remaining survivor from Alchemi. Being pushed around by the cranky Olga, Luffy decides to hunt for the treasure that everybody wants. And the mysterious girl Olga is looking to make a lot of money using Luffy and the others. The members of the Straw Hats are excited about hunting the never-seen-before treasure. Will they be able to get the legendary treasure, Pure Gold, while having the formidable treasure hunter as their opponent? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 19b
夜の王 ネコマムシの旦那見参
The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!
Le roi de la nuit. Le maître Nekomamushi bondit
Yoru no Ou: Nekomamushi no Danna Kenzan
episode.summary: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack`s amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 昼の王 イヌアラシ公爵登場!
The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!
Le roi du jour. Le duc Inuarashi fait son apparition !
Hiru no Ou: Inuarashi Koushaku Toujou!
episode.summary: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脅威襲来 百獣海賊団ジャック!
A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!
Une menace s`abat. Jack des pirates aux cent bêtes !
Kyoui Shuurai: Hyakujuu Kaizokudan Jack!
episode.summary: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy`s loose lips get them into trouble! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反撃開始 ぐるわらの一味大活躍!
Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!
Début de la contre-attaque. L`équipage du "sourcil torsadé" en action !
Hangeki Kaishi: Guruwara no Ichimi Daikatsuyaku!
episode.summary: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences… And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 失踪の真実 サンジ驚愕の招待状
The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!
La vérité derrière la disparition. Sanji reçoit une invitation surprenante
Shissou no Shinjitsu: Sanji Kyougaku no Shoutaijou
episode.summary: The mystery of Sanji`s disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom`s lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can`t be refused! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪童帰郷 四皇ビッグ・マムの刺客
The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom`s Assassins!
Le délinquant de retour chez lui. Les assassins du Yonkou Big Mom
Akudou Kikyou: Yonkou Big Mom no Shikaku
episode.summary: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack`s pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 刻限[リミット]迫る ミンク族と一味の絆!
The Time Limit Closes In! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!
La capitale anéantie. Le lien entre l`équipage et la tribu Mink !
Limit Semaru: Mink-zoku to Ichimi no Kizuna!
episode.summary: In the aftermath of Jack`s deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 首都壊滅 ぐるわらの一味上陸!
The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!
La capitale anéantie. L`équipage du sourcil torsadé à la rescousse !
Shuto Kaimetsu: Guruware no Ichimi Jouriku!
episode.summary: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren`t able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一触即発 イヌとネコと侍!
A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!
La situation s`envenime. Le chien, le chat et le samouraï !
Isshokusokuhatsu: Inu to Neko to Samurai!
episode.summary: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks! The Straw Hats try their best to stop the fight - but as day meets night and Cat Viper and Dogstorm face each other, tensions run high in the elephant country! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ決断 サンジ脱退の危機!
Luffy`s Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!
La décision de Luffy. Sanji est sur le point d`abandonner !
Luffy Ketsudan: Sanji Dattai no Kiki!
episode.summary: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he`ll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin`emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks` thirst for revenge! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネコマムシの旦那に会いに行こう
Let`s Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!
Allons rencontrer maître Nekomamushi.
Nekomamushi no Danna ni Ai ni Ikou
episode.summary: There`s only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend`s disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 野郎共へ サンジ別れの置手紙
To My Buds! Sanji`s Farewell Note!
A mes amis. Le mot d`adieu de Sanji
Yarou Domo e: Sanji Wakare no Okitegami
episode.summary: Sanji`s dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom`s crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワノ国の秘密 光月家と歴史の本文[ポーネグリフ]
The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!
Le secret du pays de Wano. La famille Kozuki et les ponégyphes
Wano Kuni no Himitsu: Kouzuki-ke to Rekishi no Ponegliffs
episode.summary: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 赤い石! "ひとつなぎの大秘宝[ワンピース]" への道標
A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!
Une stèle rouge ! Un guide pour le One Piece
Akai Ishi! "One Piece" e no Michishirube
episode.summary: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三人目! 忍者・霧の雷ぞう登場
The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!
Le troisième ! Raizō de la brume, le ninja, apparaît
Sanninme! Ninja Kiri no Raizou Toujou
episode.summary: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke`s role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の誓い ルフィと光月モモの助
A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!
Un serment d`hommes. Luffy et Kozuki Momonosuke
Okoto no Chikai: Luffy to Kouzuki Momonosuke
episode.summary: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy`s response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巨象[ズニーシャ]を救え 麦わら救急[レスキュー]大作戦!
Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat`s Rescue Operation!
Sauver Zunesha. L`opération sauvetage des Mugiwara !
Zunesha o Sukue: Mugiwara Rescue Daisakusen!
episode.summary: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant`s wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゾウ防衛戦 ルフィとズニーシャ!
A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!
Une guerre pour Zō. Luffy et Zunesha !
Zou Boueisen: Luffy to Zunesha!
episode.summary: After being aggressively attacked by Jack`s fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪夢再び 不死身のジャック強襲
The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack`s Fierce Attack!
Le retour du cauchemar. Le terrible assaut de l`invincible Jack
Akumu Futatabi: Fujimi no Jack Kyoushuu
episode.summary: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説の航海 イヌとネコと海賊王!
The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!
Le voyage légendaire. Le chien, le chat et le roi des pirates !
Densetsu no Koukai: Inu to Neko to Kaizokuou!
episode.summary: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界会議[レヴェリー]へ レベッカとサクラ王国
To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!
Direction Rêverie. Rebecca et le royaume Sakura
Reverie e: Rebecca to Sakura Oukoku
episode.summary: Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom - formerly the Drum Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdom… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界会議[レヴェリー]へ 王女ビビとしらほし姫
To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!
Direction Rêverie. La princesse Vivi et la princesse Shirahoshi
Reverie e: Oujo Vivi to Shirahoshi-hime
episode.summary: Luffy`s team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn`t realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for! Meanwhile, the leading families and leaders of the world make their way to Mariejois for the pivotal world meeting! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 別れの下象 サンジ奪還の船出!
Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!
Les adieux et la descente de l`éléphant. L`expédition pour récupérer Sanji !
Wakare no Gezou: Sanji Dakkan no Funade!
episode.summary: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy’s team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪魔の拳 決戦! ルフィVS[たい]グラント
The Devil`s Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!
Le poing du démon. Confrontation ! Luffy vs. Grount !
Akuma no Kobushi: Kessen! Luffy tai Grant
episode.summary: Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy`s upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 執念の3人 麦わら一味大追撃戦[チェイス]!
The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!
Les trois implacables. Une grande poursuite contre les Mugiwara !
Shuunen no 3 Nin: Mugiwara Ichimi Dai Chase!
episode.summary: The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they`ve had a chance to raid the cabinets for food? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空腹[ハラペコ]戦線 ルフィと海軍超新星[ルーキー]!
A Hungry Front! Luffy and the Navy Rookies!
Une bataille affamée. Luffy et les rookies de la marine !
Harapeko Sensen: Luffy to Kaigun Rookie!
episode.summary: Sneaking in to the Navy island facility to replenish their food supply, Luffy and the others risk being caught out in the open! Will their infamy make them easy to spot by the hotheaded Navy recruits around them? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カイドウ再び 脅威迫る最悪の世代!
Kaido Returns! An Imminent Threat to the Worst Generation!
Le retour de Kaido. La pire génération menacée !
Kaidou Futatabi: Kyoui Semaru Saiaku no Sedai!
episode.summary: News of the raid on the Revolutionary Army reaches Luffy! But that`s the least of their worries as they face a storm and a sudden lack of provisions! Meanwhile, Emperor Kaido, furious at the loss of Joker, fumes with anger at the reckless generation of upstarts! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 万国[トットランド]! 四皇ビッグ・マム登場
Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!
Totland ! La Yonkou Big Mom apparaît
Totto Land! Yonkou Big Mom Toujou
episode.summary: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible! But in this most heavenly of places, there are rules to be obeyed - and consequences for breaking them! Luckily someone is on the lookout for the Straw Hats! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 猛毒の危機 ルフィとレイジュ!
A Deadly Poison Crisis! Luffy and Reiju!
La crise du poison mortel. Luffy et Reiju !
Moudoku no Kiki: Luffy to Reiju!
episode.summary: On the edge of life and death, Luffy`s only hope rests with Sanji`s siblings! But even though they refuse to share an antidote, they may be able to save Luffy`s life yet, giving him enough energy to plunge right back into trouble... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 0と4 遭遇! ジェルマ66[ダブルシックス]
Zero and Four! Encountering Germa 66!
0 et 4. Rencontre avec le Germa 66 !
Rei to Yon: Souguu! Germa Double Six
episode.summary: Luffy is in danger as the venomous fish poison courses through his body! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a mysterious ship for help - a ship that bears a truly surprising crew! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンジ帰郷 ビッグ・マムの海峡[ナワバリ]へ!
Sanji`s Homecoming! Into Big Mom`s Territory!
Le retour de Sanji. Au beau milieu du territoire de Big Mom !
Sanji Kikyou: Big Mom no Nawabari e!
episode.summary: The Straw Hats continue to suffer from blazing heat and a perilous food crisis! As the seas finally calm, fishing is their only hope! Meanwhile, Sanji arrives in Big Mom`s territory and keeps his cool - until he sees his bride-to-be! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 19c
四皇の城 ホールケーキアイランド到着
The Emperor`s Castle! Arriving at the Whole Cake Island!
Le Château de la Yonko - L`arrivée sur L`île Whole Cake !
Yonkou no Shiro: Whole Cake Island Touchaku
episode.summary: As the Straw Hats draw closer to the Whole Cake Island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom’s territory - and hatches a plan to win back Sanji and take an item of great worth from the Emperor! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 首藤崩壊!? ビッグ・マムとジンベエ
The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!
La capitale s`effondre !? Big Mom et Jinbei !
Shuto Houkai!? Big Mom to Jinbee
episode.summary: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can`t prepare them fast enough her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results. Only an old face coming across the waters brings Mom what she needs, even though he also brings ill tidings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大進撃! 食いわずらいのマム
A Massive Attack! Mom`s Hunger Pangs!
Une attaque massive! La crise de faim de Mamma !
Dai Shingeki! Kui Wazurai no Mom
episode.summary: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search a specific pastry! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四皇の娘 サンジの婚約者[フィアンセ]プリン
The Emperor`s Daughter! Sanji`s Fiancee: Pudding!
La fille de la Yonkou ! La fiancée de Sanji, Pudding
Yonkou no Musume: Sanji no Fiancee Purin
episode.summary: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiancée of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji`s heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父子[おやこ]対決 ジャッジVS[たい]サンジ!
A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!
Un combat entre père et fils. Judge vs. Sanji !
Oyako Taiketsu: Judge tai Sanji!
episode.summary: Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海遊国家 ジェルマの王ジャッジ
A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa`s King Judge!
Une nation maritime. Judge, le roi de Germa
Kaiyuu Kokka: Germa no Ou Judge
episode.summary: Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マムの刺客 ルフィと誘惑の森!
Mom`s Assassin! Luffy and the Seducing Woods!
Les assassins de Mom. Luffy et la forêt tentatrice !
Mom no Shikaku: Luffy to Yuuwaku no Mori!
episode.summary: Lost in the bewildering woods and chasing after Sanji, Nami and the others find there`s more than meets the eye in this upside down part of the Whole Cake Island! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his brother! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お菓子な森 ルフィVS[たい]ルフィ!?
A Mysterious Forest Full of Candies! Luffy vs. Luffy?!
Une forêt remplie de sucreries - Luffy contre Luffy !
Okashi na Mori: Luffy tai Luffy!?
episode.summary: Brook and Pedro head out in a submersible to infiltrate Big Mom`s stronghold! Meanwhile Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot head into the island chasing the image of Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 8億の敵 ルフィVS[たい]千手のクラッカー
An Enemy Worth 800 Million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!
Un ennemi à 800 millions. Luffy vs. Cracker aux mille bras
8 Oku no Teki: Luffy tai Senshu no Cracker
episode.summary: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大幹部! 三将星クラッカー登場
A Top Officer! The Sweet 3 General Cracker Appears!
Un super officier. Cracker des trois généraux sucrés apparaît
Daikanbu! Sanshousei Cracker Toujou!
episode.summary: The identity of the enigmatic Pound, the man half-buried in the woods, is revealed, but his deep connection to Big Mom might not be enough to save him! Nami`s past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping Mom`s minions at bay! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魂の国 マムの恐るべき能力!
The Land of Souls! Mom`s Fatal Ability!
La terre des âmes. La terrifiante capacité de Mama !
Tamashii no Kuni: Mom no Osorubeki Nouryoku!
episode.summary: Finally Nami finds Luffy and recounts her harrowing tale of battling Brulee! Meanwhile the mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his true identity! But this must all be put aside when one of Mom`s most powerful generals comes calling! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巨大な野望 ビッグ・マムとシーザー
A Giant Ambition! Big Mom and Caesar!
Une ambition gigantesque. Big Mom et Caesar
Kyoudai na Yabou: Big Mom to Caesar
episode.summary: Big Mom has Caesar Clown at her whims - and despite his bilking her out of countless amounts of money - she is ready to continue her pursuit of maniacal world control! Meanwhile, Big Mom`s forces are on to the Straw Hats, and Pekoms faces a dire situation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 1と2 集結! ヴィンスモーク家
The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!
1 et 2. La famille Vinsmoke au complet
Ichi to Ni: Shuuketsu! Vinsmoke-ke
episode.summary: The wind starts to go out of Luffy`s sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全力勝負 ギア4[フォース]VS[たい]ビスビスの能力[ちから]
An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability!
Un duel décisif. Le Gear Fourth vs. la force du Bisu Bisu no Mi
Zenryoku Shoubu: Gear Fourth tai Bisbis no Chikara
episode.summary: Luffy continues to fight against Cracker, whose powers to manipulate his surroundings may prove more troublesome than he had thought! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate the Whole Cake Island - and must hatch a plan to avoid getting caught! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東の海[イーストブルー]へ サンジ決意の船出
To the East Blue! Sanji`s Resolute Departure!
Vers East Blue. Le départ affirmé de Sanji
East Blue e: Sanji Ketsui no Funade
episode.summary: The terrible history of Sanji`s family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion he is able to escape, only to face his father`s cruelty before setting out on his own. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 捨てた過去 ヴィンスモーク・サンジ
The Past That He Let Go Of! Vinsmoke Sanji!
Son passé renié. Vinsmoke Sanji
Suteta Kako: Vinsmoke Sanji
episode.summary: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji`s tragic childhood is made clear. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒りのサンジ ジェルマ66[ダブルシックス]の秘密
An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!
Un Sanji furieux. Le secret du Germa 66
Ikari no Sanji: Germa Double Six no Himitsu
episode.summary: Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa`s power - and his father`s dark history! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恩人の命 サンジと料理長[オーナー]ゼフ
The Benefactor`s Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!
La vie du bienfaiteur. Sanji et le chef cuisinier Zeff
Onjin no Inochi: Sanji to Owner Zeff
episode.summary: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge... Meanwhile, Sanji squares off against his family, but realizes they have some vital insurance to make sure he follows their scheme to marry Pudding. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲しき決闘 ルフィvs[たい]サンジ (後編)
A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2
Un duel déchirant ! Luffy vs. Sanji - Partie 2
Kanashiki Kettou: Luffy tai Sanji (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats - and Sanji`s journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲しき決闘 ルフィvs[たい]サンジ (前編)
A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1
Un duel déchirant ! Luffy vs. Sanji - Partie 1
Kanashiki Kettou: Luffy tai Sanji (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats - and Sanji`s journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 満腹の力 新ギア4[フォース]タンクマン!
The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form: Tank Man!
Le pouvoir de satiété. Une nouvelle forme du Gear Fourth, Tank man !
Manpuku no Chikara: Shin Gear Fourth Tan Man!
episode.summary: Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji`s reflection, but can they get a message to him in time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 限界勝負 ルフィと無限ビスケット
A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!
Une batailles de limites. Luffy et les biscuits infinis
Genkai Shoubu: Luffy to Mugen Biscuit
episode.summary: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker`s endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy`s endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiancée. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワンピース エピソードオブ東の海[イーストブルー] ~ルフィと4人の仲間の大冒険~
One Piece: Episode of East Blue - Luffy and His Four Friends` Great Adventure
One Piece: Episode of East Blue - Luffy to 4 Nin no Nakama no Daibouken
episode.summary: The words that Gold Roger, the King of the Pirates, uttered just before his death excited the masses and the world has entered a Great Pirate Era! There is a group of young pirates who are about to set sail on the Grand Line. Monkey D. Luffy, a rubber man. Roronoa Zoro aka “Pirate Hunter.” Usopp, a sniper. Sanji, a seafaring cook. And “Cat Burglar” Nami. They, the Straw Hats, all place a foot upon a barrel and make their vows before their next journey across the great ocean. Luffy shouts “In order to be the King of the Pirates!” A decade ago in the Windmill Village... A little boy Luffy was enthralled with a pirate boss Red-Haired Shanks. But a group of mountain bandits shows up and makes fun of the pirates. “Why didn`t you fight them?!” Luffy yells out angrily but Shanks says that it`s nothing worth getting mad over. At that time, Luffy snatches the Gum-Gum Fruit from a treasure box and eats it and as a result, his entire body becomes rubber and he loses the ability to swim for the rest of his life! A few days later, Luffy is surrounded by the mountain bandits again and Shanks comes to help. “No matter what the reason, anyone who hurts my friends has to pay!!” Shanks and his pirate crew are incredibly strong and they beat down the mountain bandits. Higuma, the head of the mountain bandits, runs away kidnapping Luffy and heads for the sea. However, they encounter a local Sea Monster there and are attacked. Luffy is in a desperate situation... But again, Shanks saves the day. He outstares the Sea Monster and chases it away but in exchange, he loses his left arm... When Shanks leaves the village, he leaves his straw hat with Luffy. “Come bring it back to me someday! Once you`ve become a great pirate!” 10 years later, Luffy has grown up strong and he sets out for an adventure on a small boat. He again encounters the local Sea Monster for that fateful day. However, Luffy takes it down with a single blow of Gum-Gum Pistol. Luffy’s journey to become the King of the Pirates now begins! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 20a
城内[シャトー]潜入 奪え! ロード歴史の本文[ポーネグリフ]
Invading the Chateau! Reach the Road Ponegliff!
Infiltration du château. Atteindre le road ponéglyphe !
Chateau Sennyuu: Ubae! Road Ponegliff
episode.summary: Chopper and Carrot are captured by Brulee and strung up for dinner! But Chopper sees a chance to free himself! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro launch a plan to reach the Ponegliffs - a daring game of chance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ここで待つ ルフィVS[たい]怒りの軍団
I`ll Wait Here! Luffy vs. the Enraged Army!
J`attendrai ici. Luffy contre l`armée enragée
Koko de Matsu: Luffy tai Ikari no Gundan
episode.summary: Luffy puts his all into battling Big Mom`s vengeful army, however, their skills combined prove too formidable. Meanwhile, Sanji goes to Big Mom herself to bargain for the Straw Hats lives - with shocking results! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冒険の終わり サンジ決意のプロポーズ
The End of the Adventure! Sanji`s Resolute Proposal!
La fin de l`aventure. La proposition résolue de Sanji
Bouken no Owari: Sanji Ketsui no Propose
episode.summary: Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐の嵐 怒りの軍団襲来!
A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!
Une tempête vengeresse ! Une armée enragée attaque !
Fukushuu no Arashi: Ikari no Gundan Shuurai!
episode.summary: Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama`s army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ~ロングリングロングランド編~ 一夜限りの特別編集版
Long Ring Long Land Arc (One Night Only Special Edited Version)
Long Ring Long Land Hen: Ichiya Kagiri no Tokubetsu Henshuu Ban
左眼の因縁 ペドロVS[たい]タマゴ男爵
The History of the Left Eye! Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!
Le destin de l`œil gauche. Pedro vs. baron Tamago
Hidari Me no Innen: Pedro tai Tamago-Danshaku
episode.summary: Luffy tries desperately to free himself as the risk of his own well-being! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot continue to search the mirror universe, Brook squares off against Big Mom, and Pedro’s past is revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さよなら プリン涙の決意
Goodbye! Pudding`s Tearful Determination!
Au revoir. La détermination éplorée de Pudding
Sayonara: Purin Namida no Ketsui
episode.summary: Sanji hopes his wedding with Pudding will solve the Straw Hat`s predicament - but Pudding secretly plans to to avoid the marriage, sharing a secret with Luffy. Meanwhile Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魂[テャマスィー]の叫び ブルック&ペドロ電撃作戦
Shout of the Soul! Brook and Pedro`s Lightning Operation!
Une âme hurlante - La stratégie électrisante de Brook et Pedro!
Tamashii no Sakebi: Brook & Pedro Dengeki Sakusen
episode.summary: Just when Luffy and Nami are in Big Mom`s grasp, Pudding arrives, but with news that they aren`t expecting - meanwhile Brook and Chopper both make headway getting out of their own jams! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 因縁の対面 ルフィとビッグ・マム!
A Fateful Confrontation! Luffy and Big Mom!
Une confrontation décisive. Luffy et Big Mom !
Innnen no Taimen: Luffy to Big Mom!
episode.summary: Pekoms creates a diversion for Brook to set his plan into action. Meanwhile Luffy continues to goad Big Mom into a fight, and Pudding begins to have stirrings of rebellion herself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 母[ソラ]の願い ジェルマの失敗作サンジ
Sora`s Wish! Germa`s Failure: Sanji!
Le souhait de Sora. Sanji, l`échec de Germa
Sora no Negai: Germa no Shippaisaku Sanji
episode.summary: Jimbei arrives on the scene and works to free Luffy and Nami! Meanwhile Sanji confronts his sister with the awful truth of Pudding, and she confides in him the powerful secret of their mother`s undying love! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不屈の魂[ソウル] ブルックVS[たい]ビッグ・マム
The Undaunted Soul! Brook vs. Big Mom!
L`âme indomptable. Brook vs. Big Mom
Fukutsu no Soul: Brook tai Big Mom
episode.summary: Brook continues his all-out struggle against Big Mom, but his secret weapon might not be enough to save him! Meanwhile an unexpected ally from the past comes to the rescue! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シケモク サンジの結婚前夜
Moist Cigarette! The Night Before Sanji`s Wedding!
Cigarette humide. La nuit avant la mariage de Sanji
Shikemoku: Sanji no Kekkon Zen`ya
episode.summary: Luffy struggles to break himself free as Sanji falls deeper in love with the idea of marrying Pudding... But the mask falls off and the deadly charade of Big Mom is revealed as the depths of her treachery come to light! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四皇の寝返り ブルック救出大作戦!
The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!
La trahison du Yonkou. Le plan de sauvetage de Brook !
Yonkou no Negaeri: Brook Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!
episode.summary: Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he`s in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous! Source: Crunchyroll

episode.title: 別れの決意 サンジと麦わら弁当
Deciding to Say Goodbye! Sanji and His Straw-Hat Bento!
Décision d`adieu. Sanji et le bentō des Mugiwara
Wakare no Ketsui: Sanji to Mugiwara Bentou
episode.summary: Brook hears Big Mom`s plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile Big Mom`s agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Montd`Or. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 城内[シャトー]動乱 ルフィ約束の場所へ
The Chateau in Turmoil! Luffy, to the Rendezvous!
Le château dans la tourmente. Luff, au rendez-vous
Chateau Douran: Luffy Yakusoku no Basho e
episode.summary: Chopper and Carrot use the mirror dimension to get in touch with Nami and Jimbei! Luffy makes it through more obstacles to learn that he just missed Sanji! Meanwhile, Sanji wonders alone about the best course of action. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンジの元へ ルフィ逆襲の大激走!
To Reach Sanji! Luffy`s Vengeful Hell-bent Dash!
Sanji de retour. La grande contre-attaque de Luffy !
Sanji no Moto e: Luffy Gyakushuu no Dai Gekisou!
episode.summary: Brook finds himself totally at the whim of Big Mom, and comes face to face with her brutal love! Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his explosive plan to create a distraction! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 約束の場所 ルフィ限界の一騎打ち
The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!
L`endroit promis. Le combat des limites de Luffy
Yakusoku no Basho: Luffy Genkai no Ikkiuchi
episode.summary: Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats. Source: Crunchyroll

episode.title: 死の協定 ルフィ&ベッジ連合軍!
The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege`s Allied Forces!
Accord mortel. Luffy et Bege allient leurs forces !
Shi no Kyoutei: Luffy & Bege Rengougun!
episode.summary: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege`s team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor! But Gastino is not who he seems, and the bait in this trap is none other than Luffy himself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 密会! ルフィVS[たい]ファイアタンク海賊団
A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!
Réunion secrète ! Luffy vs. l`équipage des Fire Tank
Mikkai! Luffy tai Fire Tank Kaizokudan
episode.summary: The Straw Hats put Jimbei`s plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable! At the same time, Nami learns about the terror of Big Mom from Lola`s twin sister! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンジ復活 壊せ! 地獄のお茶会
Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!
La résurrection de Sanji, Brisez-le ! L`enfer de la Tea Party
Sanji Fukkatsu: Kowase! Jigoku no Ochakai
episode.summary: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone “Gang” Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom! Source: Crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソつき ルフィとサンジ
A Liar! Luffy and Sanji!
Un menteur. Luffy et Sanji
Usotsuki: Luffy to Sanji
episode.summary: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji`s explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision, to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart! Source: Crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 20d
Opening 20c
Opening 20b
仮面夫婦 サンジ♥プリン入場!
The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!
Le prétendu couple. L`entrée de Sanji et de Pudding !
Kamen Fuufu: Sanji Purin Nyuujou!
episode.summary: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding`s beauty prove too enchanting? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 家族[ファミリー]集結 開宴! 地獄のお茶会
The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!
Réunion de famille. La Tea Party des enfers commence
Family Shuuketsu: Kaien! Jigoku no Ochakai
episode.summary: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom’s sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they’ve got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ暗躍 開演直前! 陰謀の結婚式
Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!
Le plan secret de Luffy. La conspiration de la cérémonie de mariage!
Luffy An`yaku: Kaien Chokuzen! Inbou no Kekkonshiki
episode.summary: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd`Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime. He goes to check if Sanji is in his room, just as Sanji is running to get back so as not to arouse suspicion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死のキス 四皇暗殺作戦開始!
A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!
Le baiser de la mort. Le début du plan d`assassinat d`un Yonkou !
Shi no Kiss: Yonkou Ansatsu Sakusen Kaishi!
episode.summary: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding`s grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos breaks out at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マムの秘密 巨人の島[エルバフ]と小さな怪物
Mom`s Secret! The Giant`s Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!
Le secret de Mama. L`île des géants et la petite bête
Mom no Himitsu: Elbaph to Chiisana Kaibutsu
episode.summary: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom`s voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走れサンジ SOS! ジェルマ66[ダブルシックス]
Run, Sanji! SOS! Germa 66!
Cours Sanji. SOS ! Germa 66
Hashire Sanji: SOS! Germa Double Six
episode.summary: The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister and Big Mom loses her wits! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 作戦失敗!? 反撃のビッグ・マム海賊団
The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!
L`échec du plan ! L`équipage de Big Mom contre-attque
Sakusen Shippai!? Hangeki no Big Mom Kaizokudan
episode.summary: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can`t even bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 盃返上! 侠客[おとこ]ジンベエの落とし前
Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!
Offrir une coupe de sake ! Le valeureux Jinbei paye sa dette
Sakazuki Henjou! Otoko Jinbee no Otoshimae
episode.summary: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父子[おやこ]の訣別 サンジとジャッジ
Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!
Couper la relation père-fils. Sanji et judge
Oyako no Ketsubetsu: Sanji to Judge
episode.summary: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege`s stronghold - with the full force of the Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, it`s only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪の軍団 変身! ジェルマ66[ダブルシックス]
The Evil Army! Transform! Germa 66!
L`armée maléfique. Transformation ! Germa 66
Aku no Gundan: Henshin! Germa Double Six
episode.summary: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom`s troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兵器[ランチャー]炸裂! ビッグ・マム暗殺の瞬間[とき]
The Launcher Blasts! The Moment Of Big Mom`s Assassination!
Explosion d`armes ! Le moment de l`assassinat de Big Mom
Launcher Sakuretsu! Big Mom Ansatsu no Toki
episode.summary: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats’ plan goes awry and all hope looks to be lost! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マム誕生 カルメルが消えた日
The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!
L`anniversaire de Mama. Le jour où Caramel a disparu
Mom Tanjou: Carmel ga Kieta Hi
episode.summary: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good. But the kindness Mother shows belies a dark and twisted secret... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ONE PIECE エピソードオブ空島
One Piece: Episode of Sky Island
One Piece: Episode of Skypiea
One Piece: Episode of Sorajima
episode.summary: The special will be the first in the "Episode of" series to cover the Skypeia arc, and will feature a character who did not appear in the original Skypeia arc from the anime. (Source: ANN)

episode.title: その目が見つめるもの
That Which Our Eyes Gaze Upon
Sante FX x One Piece
Sono Me ga Mitsumeru Mono
巨人[エルバフ]の槍 強襲! 空翔るビッグ・マム
The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!
La lance d`Elbaf ! L`assaut aérien de Big Mom !
Elbaph no Yari: Kyoushuu! Sora Kakeru Big Mom
episode.summary: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巨城[シャトー]崩壊 麦わら一味大脱走開始[スタート]!
The Chateau Collapses! The Straw Hat`s Great Escape Begins!
Le château s`effondre. La fuite des Mugiwara commence !
Chateau Houkai: Mugiwara Ichimi Dai Dassou Start!
episode.summary: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape which involves some parting of ways. Meanwhile, Big Mom’s children notice their mother’s change of behavior at the worst possible moment. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 処刑開始 ルフィ連合軍全滅!?
The Execution Begins! Luffy`s Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!
L`exécution commence. les forces alliées de Luffy sont anéanties !
Shokei Kaishi: Luffy Rengougun Zenmetsu!?
episode.summary: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation! But the mysterious Tamate Box comes in to play and shakes up the playing field - literally! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 茶会脱出! ルフィVS[たい]ビッグ・マム
Escape from the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!
Evasion de la tea Party ! Luffy vs. Big Mom
Chakai Dasshutsu! Luffy tai Big Mom
episode.summary: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom`s castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can`t resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サニーを守れ 奮戦! チョッパー&ブルック
Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!
Il faut protéger le Sunny. Chopper et Brook luttent héroïquement !
Sunny o Mamore: Funsen! Chopper & Brook
episode.summary: Mama`s onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero`s mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 偶然の再会 サンジと恋する悪プリン
A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!
Une rencontre fortuite. Sanji et l`amoureuse maléfique Pudding
Guuzen no Saikai: Sanji to Koi Suru Waru Purin
episode.summary: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn`t stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses and Pudding’s changeable heart confuses all those looking on! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反撃の雷[いかずち] ナミと雷雲ゼウス!
A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!
La contre-attaque foudroyante. Nami et Zeus le nuage orageux !
Hangeki no Ikazuchi: Nami to Raiun Zeus!
episode.summary: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: プリンの決意 大炎上! 誘惑の森
Pudding`s Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!
La résolution de Pudding. La forêt tentatrice !
Purin no Ketsui: Dai Enjou! Yuuwaku no Mori
episode.summary: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom`s word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action - and reveals her surprising motivations! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘開幕 ルフィVS[たい]カタクリ
A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!
Le combat commence. Luffy contre Katakuri !
Gekitou Kaimaku: Luffy tai Katakuri
episode.summary: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life - and the flame goes out of him... until the Sunny becomes the target of a new threat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 10億の男 最強の3将星カタクリ
The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!
L`homme qui valait un milliard. Katakuri, le plus fort des généraux sucrés !
10 Oku no Otoko: Saikyou no 3 Shousei Katakuri
episode.summary: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro’s sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 必ず戻る ルフィ命がけの出航!
I`ll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure!
Je reviendrai. Luffy part jouer sa vie !
Kanarazu Modoru: Luffy Inochigake no Shukkou!
episode.summary: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom`s naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out! Luffy has to put himself on the line again to save his crew! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夜明け前 侠客団[ガーディアンズ]団長ペドロ
Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!
Juste avant l`aube. Pedro, le capitaine des gardiens !
Yoake Mae: Guardians Danchou Pedro
episode.summary: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny`s Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past, and embraces a dramatic end to be sure that the tides of time continue to flow! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 波の部屋[グリーンルーム] 無敵の操舵主ジンベエ
The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!
La chambre verte. Jinbei, un timonier hors-pair !
Green Room: Muteki no Soudashu Jinbee
episode.summary: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves! At the same time, the ship is on a course for disaster, with Jimbei at the helm! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 土竜の脅威 ルフィ沈黙の戦い!
The Threat of the Mole! Luffy`s Silent Fight!
La menace de Mogura. Le combat silencieux de Luffy !
Mogura no Kyoui: Luffy Chinmoku no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous – but little do they know the plan is overheard! Meanwhile, Luffy’s grueling battle against Katakuri intensifies! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死闘決着!? カタクリ怒りの覚醒
The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri`s Awakening in Anger!
La fin du combat mortel. L`éveil rageur de Katakuri !
Shitou Kecchaku!? Katakuri Ikari no Kakusei
episode.summary: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa! With so much at stake, Luffy falls to Katakuri, spelling his doom! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 禁断の秘密 カタクリのおやつの時間[メリエンダ]
The Forbidden Secret! Katakuri`s Merienda!
Le secret défendu. La merienda de Katakuri
Kindan no Himitsu: Katakuri no Merienda
episode.summary: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki! But he`s not the only one who`s doing eating, as Straw Hat uses his mouth to get out from under the mochi mountain crushing him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ反撃 無敵カタクリの弱点!
Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri`s Weak Point!
La contre-attaque de Luffy ! Le point faible de l`invincible Katakuri !
Luffy Hangeki: Muteki Katakuri no Jakuten!
episode.summary: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri`s unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 危機[ピンチ]再び! ギア4VS[たい]無双ドーナツ
Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!
Nouvelle crise ! Gear Fourth vs. Musou Donuts !
Pinch Futatabi! Gear 4 tai Musou Donuts
episode.summary: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反逆の娘[シフォン] サンジのケーキ輸送大作戦
The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji`s Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!
Chiffon la rebelle. Le plan pour transporter le gâteau de Sanji !
Hangeki no Chiffon: Sanji no Cake Yusou Daisakusen
episode.summary: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の生き様 ベッジとルフィ船長の決意
A Man`s Way of Life! Bege and Luffy`s Determination as Captains!
Le mode de vie d`un homme. La détermination des capitaines Bege et Luffy
Otoko no Ikizama: Bege to Luffy Senchou no Ketsui
episode.summary: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki, but begins to ponder just how far his limits can be pushed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 21a
ケーキ沈没!? サンジ&ベッジ逃亡戦
The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege`s Getaway Battle!
Le gâteau a coulé ! Sanji et Bege fuient la bataille
Cake Chinbotsu!? Sanji & Bege Toubousen
episode.summary: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月の獅子[スーロン] キャロット神秘の大変身
Sulong! Carrot`s Big Mystic Transformation!
Sulong. La transformation mystique de Carrot
Sulong: Carrot Shinpi no Daihenshin
episode.summary: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 突破せよ 麦わらの一味大海戦!
Break Through! The Straw Hat`s Mighty Sea Battle!
Passer au travers ! La puissante bataille navale des Mugiwara !
Toppa Seyo: Mugiwara no Ichimi Dai Kaisen!
episode.summary: The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn`t this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom`s meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea? Meanwhile, Carrot`s unearthly ability based on the power of the moon saves the day! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遂に激突 四皇VS[たい]麦わらの一味
Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!
Ils s`affrontent enfin. La Yonkou contre l`équipage des Mugiwara
Tsui ni Gekitotsu: Yonkou tai Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.summary: Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom but that’s when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冥王直伝 カタクリ戦大逆転開始
Dark King`s Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!
Les préceptes du seigneur des ténèbres. Renversement de situation contre Katakuri
Meiou Jikiden: Katakuri Sen Dai Gyakuten Kaishi
episode.summary: Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri’s next move but Katakuri’s attacks keep pulling him down! However, when he summons every bit of wisdom from his training with Rayleigh, he remembers something important that could turn the tables for him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遂に帰還 四皇を止める男サンジ
Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who`ll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!
Il est de retour. Sanji, l`homme voulant arrêter un Yonkou
Tsui ni Kikan: Yonkou o Tomeru Otoko Sanji
episode.summary: The cake is finally prepared and brought before Big Mom! With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, there is a chance for the Straw Hats to flee! Big Mom`s crew is forced to decide who to attack! Meanwhile, Luffy grows ever closer to using his Haki! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇に潜む ルフィを襲う暗殺者!
Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!
Tapi dans l`obscurité. un assassin attaquant Luffy !
Yami ni Hisomu: Luffy o Osou Ansatsusha!
episode.summary: Hiding her presence, Flampe shoots her blowgun at Luffy to support her dear brother Katakuri. Meanwhile, Oven launches a dastardly plan to fence Luffy in - by destroying every mirror on the island! And Smoothie is on the tail of the Sunny as it makes its way towards Cacao Island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男の覚悟 カタクリ命がけ大勝負
One Man`s Determination! Katakuri`s Deadly Big Fight!
La résolution d`un homme. Katakuri met sa vie en jeu
Otoko no Kakugo: Katakuri Inochigake Ooshoubu
episode.summary: Katakuri notices his sister Flampe is sneakily providing poison needle back up in the shadows. Becoming enraged, he takes unexpected action that surprises everyone. Meanwhile, Smoothie increases her size and closes in on the Sunny. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目覚めろ 最強を越える見聞色!
Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top the Strongest!
L`éveil. Une perception capable de surpasser le meilleur !
Mezamero: Saikyou o Koeru Kenbun Shoku!
episode.summary: Luffy leans on his training to bring out the power of his Haki! Meanwhile the children of Big Mom gather as a massive force ready to smash Luffy and the Straw Hats. Their resentment at being embarrassed fuels their desire to get revenge! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神速の拳 新たなるギア4発動!
A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!
Poing fulgurant. Activation du nouveau Gear Fourth !
Shinsoku no Ken: Aratanaru Gear 4 Hatsudou!
episode.summary: Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels! Their powers ensure that each blow could be the last! Luffy must rely on his training, let all his thoughts out, and keep pushing on! Meanwhile, Sanji is about to land at Cacao Island! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遂に終結 壮絶カタクリ戦の行方
Finally, It`s Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight Against Katakuri!
Le dénouement tant attendu. Résultat du combat acharné contre Katakuri
Tsui ni Shuuketsu: Souzetsu Karakuri Sen no Yukue
episode.summary: Luffy`s dramatic battle finally draws to a close! But even if he is able to pull out victory in the last moment, can he remember the key to escaping the Mirrorworld?! Meanwhile, the whole host of the Big Mom Pirates watch the lonely mirror to see who will come through! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命 鉄壁のルフィ包囲網!
A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!
Une situation désespérée ! Luffy pris dans un piège infernal !
Zettaizetsumei: Teppeki no Luffy Houimou!
episode.summary: Luffy emerges safely! And Pekoms` bravery ensures he and the Straw Hats have a fighting chance! But can they withstand the full force of the Big Mom Pirates? At the last moment - a surprise explodes onto the scene! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 起死回生 最強の援軍ジェルマ!
Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements: Germa!
Retournement de situation. Le meilleur des renforts, Germa !
Kishikaisei: Saikyou no Engun Germa!
episode.summary: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain, Luffy! But the arrival of Germa has complicated matters. Whose side do these powerful superhumans fight on? In the end, sisterly love will see Sanji saved! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の砦 タイヨウの海賊団現る
The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!
Le dernier rempart. Les Pirates du Soleil débarquent
Saigo no Toride: Taiyou no Kaizokudan Arawaru
episode.summary: Luffy and Sanji are safe! But the critical moment approaches - the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! Will it be sweet release or bitter defeat? Meanwhile, a cunning pincer attack leaves the Straw Hats hopelessly trapped. Only old, reliable comrades can save the day! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魅惑の味 幸せのサンジのケーキ
A Captivating Flavor! Sanji`s Cake of Happiness!
Une saveur captivante. L`irrésistible gâteau de Sanji
Miwaku no Aji: Shiawase no Sanji no Cake
episode.summary: With the help of the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! And the Sun Pirates bid farewell to their former captain. Mama finally tastes the Wedding Cake and the results are positively scrumptious! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仁義の漢[おとこ] ジンベエ決死の大海流
The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current
Jingi no Otoko: Jinbee Kesshi no Taikairyuu
episode.summary: The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 惜別の時 プリン最後の"お願い"
The Parting Time! Pudding`s Last Wish!
Sekibetsu no Toki: Purin Saigo no "Onegai"
episode.summary: At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界驚愕 第五の海の皇帝現る!
The World Is Stunned! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Emerges!
Sekai Kyougaku: Daigo no Umi no Koutei Arawaru!
episode.summary: Luffy`s recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats` next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界会議[レヴェリー]へ 集結! 麦わらの盟友達
To the Reverie! The Straw Hats` Sworn Allies Come Together!
Reverie e: Shuuketsu! Mugiwara no Meiyuu-tachi
episode.summary: As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don`t fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy`s exploits and remembers their shared past. Meanwhile, Luffy is confronted with a staggering change to his bounty! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サボ動く 革命軍全軍隊長登場!
Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!
Sabo Ugoku: Kakumeigun Zengun Taichou Toujou!
episode.summary: A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard’s affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help. They’re the captains of the Revolutionary Army. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出す 執念の新元帥サカズキ
Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!
Ugokidasu: Shuunen no Shin Gensui Sakazuki
episode.summary: At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 頂上戦争 継がれた海賊王の意思
The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!
Choujou Sensou: Tsugareta Kaizokuou no Ishi
episode.summary: Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague, Admiral Ryokugyu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢の一歩 しらほし太陽の下へ!
One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!
Yume no Ippo: Shirahoshi Taiyou no Shita e!
episode.summary: Stelly, Sabo’s adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 会いたい ビビとレベッカの想い
I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca`s Sentiments!
Aitai: Vivi to Rebecca no Omoi
episode.summary: Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 21b
Opening 21c
Opening 21d
Opening 21e
Opening 21f
Opening 21g
聖地の闇 謎の巨大な麦わら帽子
In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!
Seichi no Yami: Nazo no Kyodai na Mugiwara Boushi
episode.summary: Vivi reunites with Dalton and Dr. Kureha from the Sakura Kingdom and they share their memories of the Straw Hats with Shirahoshi and Rebecca. Meanwhile, a shadowy figure descends a long staircase at the castle in the Holyland and opens a mysterious door. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖地騒然 狙われたしらほし姫!
The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!
Seichi Souzen: Nerawareta Shirahoshi-hime!
episode.summary: Shirahoshi crosses the fancy of a Celestial Dragon, and those living gods are not open to having their whims disobeyed! As she is dragged away, King Neptune comes to her rescue, risking life and limb by defying the Celestial Dragon, but luckily an old friend of the Ryugu Kingdom is on hand and tries to defuse the situation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一触即発 ルフィ狙う二人の四皇
An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!
Isshokusokuhatsu: Luffy Nerau Futari no Yonkou
episode.summary: The Emperors of the Sea, Big Mom and Kaido decide to team up against Luffy! Meanwhile, Garp hears about the wild exploits of his grandson, all while a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サボ怒る 革命軍幹部くまの悲劇
Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!
Sabu Ikaru: Kakumeigun Kanbu Kuma no Higeki
episode.summary: After sneaking into the Land of the Gods, Sabo sees the shocking figure of his friend – Kuma! Abused by the World Government as a pawn in their games, Kuma, who was made an example of what happens when you disobey the gods! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 21h
Opening 21i
Opening 21j
Opening 21k
遂に開幕 陰謀渦巻く世界会議[レヴェリー]!
Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!
Tsui ni Kaimaku: Inbou Uzumaku Reverie!
episode.summary: The Reverie has begun! The representative kings and queens first discuss what to do with Straw Hat Luffy. Meanwhile the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma! All while they recount how the Straw Hats have grown from upstarts into world players! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マルコ! 白ひげの形見の守護者
Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard`s Last Memento!
Marco! Shirohige no Katami no Shugosha
episode.summary: In order to recruit a strong ally towards bringing down Kaido, Cat Viper and his crew stop by Whitebeard’s homeland to see Marco, the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 滝登り! ワノ国の海域大航海!
Climbing up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano`s Sea Zone!
Takinobori! Wano Kuni no Kaiiki Dai Koukai!
episode.summary: Luffy and the others become excited as they see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie while they close in on the Land of Wano. But this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious! The sea itself is a barrier! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 21l
Opening 21m
Opening 21n
Opening 21o
ワノ国! 桜舞うサムライの国へ
The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country Where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!
Wano Kuni! Sakura Mau Samurai no Kuni e
episode.summary: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano but all his friends are nowhere to be found. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お玉登場 ルフィVS[たい]カイドウ軍!
Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido`s Army!
Ootama Toujou: Luffy tai Kaidou Gun!
episode.summary: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 必ず来る ワノ国のエース伝説!
He`ll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!
Kanarazu Kuru: Wano Kuni no Ace Densetsu!
episode.summary: Otama`s gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特別編! 最強の賞金狩りシードル
Side Story! The World`s Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!
Tokubetsu Hen! Saikyou no Shoukingari Cidre
episode.summary: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre’s group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny`s Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution - but Luffy is quickly in over his head! Luckily a vivacious old friend is nearby! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特別編! 決戦! ルフィVS炭酸王
Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!
Tokubetsu Hen! Kessen! Luffy vs Tansan Ou
episode.summary: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 21p
Opening 22
お玉救え 麦わら荒野を駆ける!
Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding Through the Wasteland!
Otama Sukue: Mugiwara Kouya o Kakeru!
episode.summary: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido`s underlings show up too! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真打ち! 魔術師ホーキンス登場
The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!
Shin`uchi! Majutsushi Hawkins Toujou
episode.summary: Otama’s temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido’s Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敗北確定 ストローマンの猛攻!
Defeat Is Inevitable! The Strawman`s Fierce Attack!
Haiboku Kakutei: Strawman no Moukou!
episode.summary: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison. All the while, old acquaintances look on from a distance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最高の日 お玉初めてのおしるこ
The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!
Saikou no Hi: Otama Hajimete no Oshiruko
episode.summary: Otama`s life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun’s men! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵陣突入 役人はびこる博羅町!
Charging into the Enemy`s Territory! Bakura Town: Where Officials Thrive!
Tekijin Totsunyuu: Yakunin Habikoru Bakura-chou!
episode.summary: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 横綱登場 お菊狙う無敵の浦島!
The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!
Yokozuna Toujou: Okiku Nerau Muteki no Urashima!
episode.summary: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo’s back, looking for the kidnapped Otama, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there and shows his brutal nature! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 相撲決戦 麦わらVS最強の横綱!
A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
Sumou Kessen: Mugiwara vs Saikyou no Yokozuna!
episode.summary: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルフィ激怒 ピンチのお玉を救え!
Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!
Luffy Gekido: Pinch no Otama o Sukue!
episode.summary: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town’s boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates’ Headliners, and Otama who is hanging in the mouth of a lion in Holdem’s stomach. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お玉奪還 激闘! ホールデム戦!
Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!
Otama Dakkan: Gekitou! Holdem Sen!
episode.summary: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins who is also working for Kaido and chasing after Luffy, is confronted by a mysterious figure. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一騎打ち 魔術師と死の外科医!
Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
Ikkiuchi: Majutsushi to Shi no Gekai!
episode.summary: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town! Meanwhile, Trafalgar Law’s attempt to silence Basil Hawkins fails when he hears bad news about his alliance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宝船到来 ルフィ太郎の恩返し!
The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
Takarabune Tourai: Luffytarou no Ongaeshi!
episode.summary: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎の墓標 おでん城跡での再会!
Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!
Nazo no Bohyou: Oden Jou Ato de no Saikai!
episode.summary: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin’emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin’emon’s ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 20周年特別編「ROMANCE DAWN」
Romance Dawn
20 Shuunen Tokubetsu Hen "Romance Dawn"
episode.summary: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説の侍 ロジャーが惚れた男!
A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!
Densetsu no Samurai: Roger ga Horeta Otoko!
episode.summary: Kin’emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed. Kin’emon and his fellow vassals ran to Oden Castle in flames to save Oden’s wife Toki and children but Toki told him a shocking truth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 打倒四皇 極秘討ち入り作戦発動
Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!
Datou Yonkou: Gokuhi Uchiiri Sakusen Hatsudou
episode.summary: Kin’emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke’s mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes. However, discovering that there were still their allies there, they started preparing to take down Kaido and Orochi who ruined the country. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の男 盗賊団棟梁・酒天丸!
The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!
Saikyou no Otoko: Touzokudan Touryou Shutenmaru!
episode.summary: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin’emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people. Ashura Doji, under the name Shutenmaru, then faces Kaido’s right-hand man and gets into a fierce fight! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遂に激突 猛攻ルフィVSカイドウ
Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
Tsui ni Gekitotsu: Moukou Luffy vs Kaidou
episode.summary: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed’s back to her home. Furious, Luffy reveals himself to Kaido and starts to retaliate! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破壊的! 一撃必殺の雷鳴八卦!
Destructive! One Shot, One Kill: Thunder Bagua!
Hakaiteki! Ichigeki Hissatsu no Raimei Hakke!
episode.summary: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow. Law tries to rescue Luffy but is interrupted by Hawkins and now Kaido approaches Luffy, unconscious on the ground. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生き地獄 ルフィ屈辱の大採掘場
A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!
Ikijigoku: Luffy Kutsujoku no Dai Saikutsuba
episode.summary: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle in order to confirm the safety of the Straw Hats and the others. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖地激動 不敵に笑う四皇黒ひげ
