The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!
Seichi Gekidou: Futeki ni Warau Yonkou Kurohige
episode.summary: On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile, Moria raids the Pirate Island of Fullalead with his zombie army to take back his friend from Blackbeard. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全員消滅 カイドウ怒りのボロブレス!
Everyone Is Annihilated! Kaido`s Furious Blast Breath!
Zen`in Shoumetsu: Kaidou Ikari no Boro Breath!
episode.summary: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin’emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them. However, Kaido heads towards the ruins of Oden Castle where they left their crew behind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出す 打倒カイドウ大計画!
It`s On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!
Ugokidasu: Datou Kaidou Dai Keikaku!
episode.summary: Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call. Meanwhile, Sanji and the others are on their mission to recruit like-minded people who become skeptical as they receive the secret message from the Kozuki Clan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大暴れ! 囚人ルフィとキッド!
Rampage! The Prisoners: Luffy and Kid!
Ooabare! Shuujin Luffy to Kid!
episode.summary: In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence: death. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大評判! サンジの十八番[おはこ]そば!
A Great Sensation! Sanji`s Special Soba!
Dai Hyouban! Sanji no Ohako Soba!
episode.summary: Sanji’s Special Soba becomes very popular but some gang members come to disturb his business and knock over a customer’s bowl. Infuriated, Sanji takes them down and gives the customer, a little girl named Toko, another serving. Later, Sanji and his friends find out that Toko is an attendant to an important figure in the Land of Wano. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 豪華絢爛 ワノ国一の美女・小紫
Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano`s Most Beautiful Woman: Komurasaki!
Goukakenran: Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo Komurasaki!
episode.summary: Wano’s top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. There is a crowd of people on the street as well as Sanji and the others. While everyone is fascinated by her, some seeking vengeance get in the Oiran’s way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 任侠伝! ゾロとトの康二人旅!
A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu`s Little Trip!
Ninkyou Den! Zoro to Tonoyasu Futari Tabi!
episode.summary: Zoro who has been wandering around the Land of Wano since he got separated from his friends meets a sycophant named Tonoyasu. Tonoyasu paid for Zoro’s sushi and to pay him back, Zoro gambles at dice. However, he realizes that the dealer and the others are cheating. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緊急事態 ビッグ・マム大接近!
A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes In!
Kinkyuujidai: Big Mom Dai Sekkin!
episode.summary: Zoro is taken to the sycophant Tonoyasu’s poor hometown, Ebisu Town where people laugh away their misfortune. On the other hand, Wano’s Shogun – Orochi has a lavish banquet while Big Mom is closing in on the country at a furious speed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 都騒然! サンジ狙う新たな刺客
The Capitol in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
Miyako Souzen! Sanji Nerau Arata na Shikaku
episode.summary: As the Big Mom Pirates approach the Land of Wano, Kaido’s subordinates led by King and Queen try to get rid of them. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, another member of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in the city, in search of Sanji. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大活躍! 正義のおそばマスク!
Dashing! The Righteous Soba Mask!
Dai Katsuyaku! Seigi no Osoba Mask!
episode.summary: Sanji faces Page One, a Headliner of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, who questions the soba cook’s true identity. Sanji uses Germa’s device for the first time and transforms himself into Stealth Black while dubbing himself Soba Mask. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命 脅威のオロチお庭番衆
A Desperate Situation! Orochi`s Menacing Oniwabanshu!
Zettaizetsumei: Kyoui no Orochi Oniwaban Shuu
episode.summary: While the banquet grows livelier at Orochi’s Castle, Robin is confronted by his ninja force called Oniwabanshu. In the meanwhile in Kuri, Chopper, Tama, and Momonosuke train themselves preparing for the incoming battle but are interrupted when they find someone washed up on the beach. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 修羅場! 怒れる大蛇 将軍オロチ
Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!
Shuraba! Ikareru Daija: Shougun Orochi
Episode 928
